story:
Short Summary

The Peculiarium (www.peculiarium.com) is a unique, fun, unforgettable experience that has lived in its NW Thurman St. location in Portland, Oregon for four years, since April 2011. A bunch of artists and sci-fi enthusiasts, headed up by founders Mike Wellins and Lisa Freeman, came together to make a playground for the slightly offbeat. Inside, visitors find nods to some of our favorite monsters, displays of popular urban legends, irreverent artwork, interactive sights and sounds that crack people up, make them shriek, and leave nearly everyone with a big smile. Our displays are decidedly low-tech, but they’re one-of-a-kind, and they all speak to the kid in us who loves creepy crawly things, B-movies and a good scary story.

Each year, sales and crowds have increased and more and more people from all over the city, country, even the world, have become fans of the underground goodness that is the Peculiarium. We’re delighted and humbled, and we’ve met hundreds of amazing people who also think in creative, unique ways over the past four years. We’ve had a great time creating new exhibits to explore, offering extreme edible concoctions, and buying and selling unusual art, artifacts and ephemera.



The Mobile Peculiarium will be an awesome truck or trailer full of all the good things housed in the Peculiarium, that comes to your neighborhood! If food carts can do it, why not an oddities museum? Imagine a summer day in SE Portland when you get the Tweet that Peculiarium is headed in your direction! For several hours, you get the aliens, Bigfoot, and super-secret exhibits now in the development stages, right in your own part of town. Maybe a show has just let out at a popular music club downtown at midnight, and as you exit, you find the magical Peculiarium just outside, open and ready for visitors. One day, the Peculiarium lives in St. Johns. Another day, it caters to fans in Sellwood. We want to go where our fans are! Private parties? Yes! Hire the freakin’ Peculiarium to conduct its odd operations at your party! Just try to tell us that wouldn’t be your best party all year. Street fairs in Seattle, Tacoma, Vancouver, Salem, Eugene, Roseburg? Why not! A mobile Peculiarium will allow us to bring more original exhibits and interactive displays with us to all our events! Using Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, and eventually a locator app, our current location will be just a click away. 


What We Need & What You Get

So now that you have the image in your mind, consider what it would take to make this happen. We, the Peculiarium founders, are naturally frugal and clever people who will make the most of any resources, and recycle and upcycle wherever possible, as we have always done. We can make dollars go a long way, and that’s what we intend to do with this campaign. Our budget includes a suitable box truck, trailer, or bus (size depends on how much funding we can secure) that can comfortably accommodate museum visitors, the licensing costs of the vehicle, a generator to run lighting and the exhibits, the retrofitting of current exhibits and installation of new exhibits for the new space (two new exciting exhibits have plans drawn up already), exterior design/paint, and the cost of mailing the thank-you perks to our wonderful contributors. After a bunch of research and careful analysis, we've determined the total amount to make this dream a reality is $24,565. Any funding that exceeds this amount goes even further toward a bigger vehicle, more open hours & days, further reach, more elaborate exhibits, more original artwork & one of a kind oddities for YOU to enjoy. As a stretch goal, we hope to take the Peculiarium on a US tour and bring this awesomeness to even more people. We've got friends in AZ, KS, PA, CA, IL, and more, all waiting for us to show up!

We have tons of peculiar perks for you in return for helping us with our goal. Stickers, postcards, coloring books, comic books, T-shirts, original artwork, a private catered party in the new Mobile Peculiarium, and even a Life-Sized Bigfoot, made just for you!!


The Impact

As we enter our 5th year in business and know our customers better, we think this is the perfect time to take the museum in directions that make it even more fun for the people who visit. To recap, our goals for this campaign are:

•to increase our exposure so that everyone in Portland and out-of-town visitors alike can enjoy the Peculiarium experience.

•to have a sweet, self-contained mobile museum that we can operate anywhere, any time

•to continue to come up with more wild and super-fun exhibits that fit into a mobile rig.

•to allow Biggie to get out of the museum and become the Big Ape/Man about town

•And to take advantage of current and emerging social media in order to make our cool, bizarre experience easier for you to access!

Please lay down some cash for this epic venture. You’ll love the prizes, you’ll love the new mobile Peculiarium, and we’ll love you for it! We are very excited about this project, and together, we can make the coolest mobile museum and funhouse EVER! Shoot us a message if you have questions or suggestions. We’d love to talk about it with you!


FAQ

Will the store on Thurman St. stay open?

We don't have any plans to leave our original location. The mobile Peculiarium will be in addition to the brick and mortar shop. We don't know about the future, but we and our visitors love the pink building.

Will there be admissions charged?

It's possible that we will charge admission to the exhibit section of the mobile museum (not in the gift shop section), but we've decided it would never be more than $1-$2 per person.

How far will the mobile museum go?

We plan to go to all the suburbs of the Portland/Vancouver area, as many of our visitors are from these areas. Beaverton, Hillsboro, Tigard, Wilsonville, Gresham, Carver, Clackamas, Milwaukie, etc. With enough funding, we'd love to go on a US tour! That's our stretch goal.

Will the mobile be just like the store?

Short answer: yes. We'll scale down the food service in order to add more exhibits, but will probably still do some sort of peculiar snacks. Everything else will be for sale like in the shop. The number of things we have in the vehicle depend on the space inside the vehicle. It'll be a micro-version of the current shop.

What happens if you don't raise enough money?

We have very flexible and modular goals. In our first 12 hours, we raised $1400, which will already improve the presence of the street fairs we participate in quite a bit, in that we'll be able to retrofit a few exhibits for a smaller space. In addition, we're building a new Bigfoot that will sit inside the vehicle or outside at fairs, allowing people to take their pics sitting on his lap. Our current Bigfoot can't move from the shop due to his size and shape. Every dime we get will add to some part of our exhibits and displays.

Please let us know if you have any other questions!


Risks & Challenges

Risks include not getting the word out to enough people about the fundraiser and making a very small amount of money in this campaign.  However, we are confident that we'll make the most of every penny pledged, and bring it back around to improving availability and a fun experience for our visitors.

Another potential challenge is that the idea of a mobile oddities museum is a relatively new concept, and one that some may have a hard time understanding. In our research, we've found some very successful and creative mobile shops in L.A., D.C., and other larger cities. Portland is well known as a smaller city whose residents have very big and brave ideas, and we think we fit right in. Our concept has proven to be a crowd-pleaser among those who know about us. Now we need to bring it to the rest of the city.

In addition, food carts appear to be here to stay, much to our delight, and we plan to borrow their social media expertise and their success at small-space efficiency to help us establish this new way of reaching our favorite people.


Other Ways You Can Help

We know not everyone can contribute hundreds or thousands of dollars for the cause, but there are ways you can really help, even if you don't have a dime to give.

Share our campaign on your Facebook, Twitter, Reddit, Email, and any other social media groups you participate in. Remember, Indiegogo itself has some pretty awesome share tools.

If you know someone in local media (blogger, reporter, photographer, general loudmouth), let them know about our campaign and ask them to plug it for us.

Tell all your Bunko, Bowling & Beach Blanket Bingo pals about the campaign.

Make a sign that says: "Help The Peculiarium Go Mobile on Indiegogo!!" and plant it in your yard.

Write the Indiegogo campaign link on your stomach and take a selfie.

Getting the word out REALLY helps!

story:
Short Summary

The Vegan Goddess has been supplying the Pittsburgh area with vegan sweets and eats for some time now, and has finally written the cookbook that's been requested!  Globetrotting with the Vegan Goddess will debut at the Pittsburgh Vegan Festival on May 30th, 2015!  Visiting 25 nations and regions, you'll get a veganized world tour of delicious, easy-to-make food.


What I Need & What You Get

  • $6,000 is needed for the printing and shipping of 500 copies of the book.
  • $1,500 is needed for the research and development of the recipes in the book.
  • $500 will help market the book in the general Pittsburgh area.
  • If the goal of $8,000 isn't reached, we'll run a smaller quantity of books in the initial printing.
What backers get:
  • $5 backers will get listed in the thank-you section of the book.
  • $15 backers will get three recipes from the book emailed to them.
  • $35 backers will get a copy of the book once printed (includes shipping).
  • $50 backers will get a personalized SIGNED copy of the book once printed (includes shipping).
  • $100 backers can choose a recipe to dedicate (either to themselves or dedicated to someone they love).
  • $500 backers can choose a country to dedicate (either to themselves or dedicated to someone they love).
  • $1,000 backers will get the book co-dedicated to them!


The Impact

I grew up in a house where the parents (pre-kids) had traveled the world and explored the cuisine, art, and culture of every country they visited.  My mother put me in the kitchen at age 2, helping her with her annual Christmas cookie bonanza, instilling in me a lifelong love of cooking and baking.  My childhood was spent in an area of the country that wasn't very culturally diverse, so Mom supplemented that with exploring the world through food - making traditional dishes accessible to myself and my brother, and our friends.  

As anyone who is vegan knows, much of the world's cuisine outside of the United States is very vegan-friendly.  Between my background and my passions for vegan food and international awareness, this is the cookbook I was born to write!  With it, I hope to start cooking demonstrations around the Pittsburgh area, with a special emphasis on ensuring children can participate in the making of the recipes, to inspire the next generation of travelers and cooks.


Risks & Challenges

I have already sunk at least $1,500 of my own money into the ingredients during the research and development phase of this book.  I realize that I might not be able to get that back, but this is absolutely a labor of love.  I am dedicated to printing this book, even if it means printing in a smaller quantity than I'd like.  I am using the self-publishing arm of Amazon, which fortunately allows you to print as many copies as you want, in addition to listing the book as a print-on-demand item on Amazon after it's designed.


Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please share this to your friends and family, even if you can't personally contribute!  Indiegogo has great sharing tools!

story:
The Free Portrait Project paints a portrait of a place through its people by giving oil-painted portraits to residents of Crown Heights for an entire year.  Crafting a physical record of who we are now amid shifting demographics, it documents our community and quietly breaks the tradition of portraiture reserved only for a wealthy few by giving these portraits… for FREE.

I’ll give portraits that normally cost $500 or more to neighbors who may not otherwise have access to being painted, showing commonality between disparate groups all in one place.  Local venues and galleries will show the work as it emerges, and the entire collection of over 200 portraits will be held with a reception for the portrait sitters and their families to gather and celebrate their newfound commonality.  Thereafter, the paintings belong to them.

With the support of the community and people like you, we’re raising $44,000 to fund the project for one year.  These funds will cover equipment, materials, AND studio rent, and I’ll paint Crown Heights, through its people, full-time.

Any and all residents of Crown Heights are eligible to receive a portrait.  We've partnered with our elected officials and Community Boards to ensure that we faithfully reflect the diversity of the neighborhood, with everyone represented on equal stature-- State Senators next to shelter residents, and local merchants next to YOU.

So spread the word: Share it, tweet it, pin it, instagram it.  Share the value of this campaign, and encourage everyone you know to back this project.

I believe this work will tremendously benefit the community and its residents, and with your help, we'll make it happen.  

So, who is Crown Heights?  We are Crown Heights.

Most Sincerely,

Rusty Zimmerman

www.wearecrownheights.org

story:
Short Summary

We are a US-Based Non-Profit, Disabled Veteran Run Organization along side with the Houston International University, having the mission to provide qualified Veterans the opportunity to learn the necessary professional training and skills to become successful in technology related occupations.  Our current services include internship opportunities, counseling, fitness program, and housing opportunities.  We pride ourselves of our 100% employment success rate for our veterans. We are also excited to add acupuncture as a new service to our program!

What We Need

By supporting the veterans, we will be able to obtain a minimum of 10 treatment tables/massage tables, and some medical supplies.  We figure $2000 should be the minimum to start.  However, if we receive any funding in excess, it will be used appropriately for more related equipment as needed, start more natural health programs, as well as funding research to help our veterans.

We have been able to partner up with local Houston licensed acupuncturists  to provide a safe, natural, and effective modality for PTSD and TBI recovery.  The acupuncturists will also provide self-help education in natural health, diet and lifestyle, and exercises such as tai-chi and qi-gong.

The Impact

With your help, we are able to make our new special service become possible:  to provide acupuncture for our unsung Heroes, US Veterans recover from PTSD (Posttraumatic Stress Disorder) and TBI (Traumatic Brain Injury). 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, please share with those who can help. Your effort is deeply appreciated.

story:
We are Omer and Ida Sivan. A year and a half ago we have moved to Ibiza and started an ecological farm in a rented property using about 2,000 square meters. Now it is the time to buy a land and rebuild our farm and agriturismo hotel.

After a year and a half of working hard we have confident that we are on the right track. We sell on regular basis fresh vegetables, fruits, free range eggs and free range chicken meat. We also have ducks, rabbits, two sheaps and one pig that in the coming future will give us income too. Recently we started a mushroom farm which has a great demand. 

You can visit our Facebook page to see what we have accomplished this year:

https://www.facebook.com/IbizaGranjaEcologicaCanSivan

In order to develop our business we need more land, our own land. We found the perfect land for the farm and we are in negotiation to buy it. The land area is big enough to enable us to build the farm and agritourism hotel. In order to accomplish that we need about 300,000 euros in addition to our own capital. In the first step we are missing 100,000 euros in order to buy the land and pay the purchase tax. The target of 50,000 euros was chosen in order to reduce the indiegogo fee incase we will not meet the higher target in two months. We would like that most of your donation money will reach us. 

The land is located in Sant Rafael, which is in the center of Ibiza and is one of the most fertilized area in Ibiza with good underground water availability. 

Our own capital is just a little under than the price of the land. The money that we will raise will be used in the following order: completing the price of the land, purchasing tax, drilling water well including licence costs. 
In the second stage we'll need to raise the additional 200,000 euros will used: moving and rebuilding the farm, construction licence costs for the hotel and the construction of the hotel. We plan to build green building with rain water collecting systems, solar panels with wind turbines for electricity, recycling water system and more, under the limitations of the spanish construction rules.

The agrotourism hotel will be small and intimate of 4-6 suits. The size of the hotel will depend on the amount of money that will be raised. The hotel will include small restaurant which will serve ecological food, mostly from the farm products. The land is in a natural landscape, quiet and calm but on the other hand in a distance of up to 15 min drive from all the big towns in Ibiza and between 10 to 30 min drive from Ibiza's beautiful beaches.

The time to get construction permits in Ibiza is about 12-18 months and the construction time up to additional 6 months. So we expect to be able to have guests in the hotel starting form Spring 2017. After we will get the construction permits we will be able to get a mortgage from the bank, but we prefer to reward you for your donations than being owing the bank 25 years.

Hope our project interest you and you can help us by donation.

Thank you
story_txt:
We are Omer and Ida Sivan. A year and a half ago we have moved to Ibiza and started an ecological farm in a rented property using about 2,000 square meters. Now it is the time to buy a land and rebuild our farm and agriturismo hotel.
After a year and a half of working hard we have confident that we are on the right track. We sell on regular basis fresh vegetables, fruits, free range eggs and free range chicken meat. We also have ducks, rabbits, two sheaps and one pig that in the coming future will give us income too. Recently we started a mushroom farm which has a great demand. 
You can visit our Facebook page to see what we have accomplished this year:
https://www.facebook.com/IbizaGranjaEcologicaCanSivan
In order to develop our business we need more land, our own land. We found the perfect land for the farm and we are in negotiation to buy it. The land area is big enough to enable us to build the farm and agritourism hotel. In order to accomplish that we need about 300,000 euros in addition to our own capital. In the first step we are missing 100,000 euros in order to buy the land and pay the purchase tax. The target of 50,000 euros was chosen in order to reduce the indiegogo fee incase we will not meet the higher target in two months. We would like that most of your donation money will reach us. 
The land is located in Sant Rafael, which is in the center of Ibiza and is one of the most fertilized area in Ibiza with good underground water availability. 
Our own capital is just a little under than the price of the land. The money that we will raise will be used in the following order: completing the price of the land, purchasing tax, drilling water well including licence costs. 

In the second stage we'll need to raise the additional 200,000 euros will used: moving and rebuilding the farm, construction licence costs for the hotel and the construction of the hotel. We plan to build green building with rain water collecting systems, solar panels with wind turbines for electricity, recycling water system and more, under the limitations of the spanish construction rules.




The agrotourism hotel will be small and intimate of 4-6 suits. The size of the hotel will depend on the amount of money that will be raised. The hotel will include small restaurant which will serve ecological food, mostly from the farm products. The land is in a natural landscape, quiet and calm but on the other hand in a distance of up to 15 min drive from all the big towns in Ibiza and between 10 to 30 min drive from Ibiza's beautiful beaches.

The time to get construction permits in Ibiza is about 12-18 months and the construction time up to additional 6 months. So we expect to be able to have guests in the hotel starting form Spring 2017. After we will get the construction permits we will be able to get a mortgage from the bank, but we prefer to reward you for your donations than being owing the bank 25 years.
Hope our project interest you and you can help us by donation.
Thank you

story:
Hi my name is Tyra and I am a senior at William Penn High School.  As a senior, I am required to complete a senior legacy project. We were asked to identify a problem in the community and solve it.  I decided to work on a problem faced by many seniors, senior expenses.  Senior year can be pricey, from senior dues, college applications, trips, and let not forget the biggest of them all PROM.

Many seniors do not attend prom because they cannot afford the price. I decided to create Operation Prom-ise as my senior legacy project.

Operation Promise is a "Prom"ise I am making to my fellow seniors.

My goal is to purchase prom tickets which are $80. each and assist with purchasing items needed for their prom. i.e, Tuxedo rentals, make-up application, hair, accessories, dresses.  

Please help me help my classmates create memories that will last a lifetime.  Thank you in advance.   **If more additional funds are raised, I will my assist my classmates with their senior dues.** (if senior dues are not paid before graduation the senior will not walk across the stage.)

story:
Kurzbeschreibung


Wer sind wir und warum machen wir all das?

Hallo Liebe Freunde & Familien in der ganzen Welt, ich bin André Fiedler, wir haben einen einzigartigen Planeten, ich liebe Ihn und aller Geschöpfe, einschließlich dir. :)

Unser Team,
besteht aus:
André Fiedler - Der Visionär & Entrepreneur
Jan Diet - Der Stein in der Brandung und Adler der Lüfte
Frau Maier - Chefsekretärin und gut Seele bei Cocojambo

Worum geht es bei Cocojambo?
Kokoswasser ist einer der Heilkräftigsten, gesündesten und leckersten Flüssigkeiten dieses Wundervollen Planeten. Es hilft bei Kranken die wieder gesund werden möchten oder gesunden die gesund bleiben wollen oder zu höchster Leistung streben.
Enthält große Mengen an Verjüngenden Cytokininen, Mineralien, Vitaminen, Enzymen, Eiweiß und ganz wichtig Spurenelementen, die wir alle brauchen.
Ist Lecker, hilft bei vielen Krankheiten und Beschwerden, es wird Wasser des Himmels genannt und wird heute noch als Heilwasser in Tropischen Ländern mit nachweisbaren Erfolg angewendet.
(ich könnte die ganze Seite nur mit den tollen Heilkräften des Kokoswassers voll schreiben, :D ) Es gibt schon jetzt seit neuem regelmäßig YouTube filme von Cocojambo wo wir viele Möglichkeiten der Anwendung und heilkräfte etc. zeigen. Das nächste ist ein Beautyfilm, mit einer Kosmetikerin eines großen Hotels ;) mehr wird noch nicht verraten, schaut es euch an.
Mit meiner Kampagne möchte ich genug Geld sammeln um 5L, 10L und 20L Packungen mit reinem frischen Kokoswasser in Deutschland zu dem bestmöglichsten Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis zu Verkaufen. (eine 5L Packung soll ca. 12€ kosten. So kann es sich jeder etwas für seine Gesundheit tun, auch Studenten und Großfamilien)
In dem wir den direkten Weg von Hersteller über uns bis zu dir wählen und nur das notwendigste einsetzen (kein Verschwendertum und keine Raffgier) bleibt das Geld nicht beim Importeur, Großhändler und im Ladengeschäft hängen. Somit können wir viel größere Mengen, von höchstwertigem Kokoswasser für alle bereitstellen. 
Das Cocojambo - Kokoswasser, kann dann auf unserer Homepage (die wir mit dem Geld der Kampagne unter anderem erstellen lassen können) ganz einfach ab Anfang Juni bestellt werden.

Durch deine Spende oder Hilfe, passieren folgende Dinge:

  • Wir erstellen eine ansprechende Homepage
  • Wir gehen vor Ort und überprüfen das nur 100% Kokoswasser in bester Qualität bei dir ankommt. (Das werden wir regelmäßig auf unseren Portalen veröffentlichen)
  • Das Design, Logo etc. für Homepage, Produktkartons, T-Shirts werden Produziert
  • Der erste Kontainer wird bestellt
  • Wir bezahlen den ersten Teil der Helden die uns bis hier her geholfen haben.
  • Die ersten Marketingaktionen beginnen und viele Menschen können das gesunde und reine Cocojambo Kokoswasser erleben.
  • Die Regionale Wirtschaft wird direkt in Sri Lanka sowie in deiner Nähe unterstützt. Das Geld bleibt durch unsere Regionalen Zahlungsmöglichkeit direkt in der vor Ort und stärkt somit alle in deiner Umgebung


Was du uns gibst & was du bekommst

  • Wir haben um die ersten Schwierigsten Hürden zu überwinden 10.000€ eingeplant. Jede Ausgabe von diesen 10.000€ wird auf unserer Homepage eingetragen, so hast du immer den Überblick was gerade mit deiner Spende gemacht wird. (Wir beweisen das es sehr wohl Möglich ist, mit einer offenen Preispolitik zu wachsen. Wer weiß vielleicht nehmen irgendwann auch andere Firmen oder die Politik sich ein Vorbild daran. Fairness für alle! :D )
  • kleines Beispiel für die ersten 3Monate (ca.Beträge): Homepage 450€, Logo 250€, Online-Marketing 1.500€ (für den Anfang), Import kleiner Kontainer 2.500€ und noch sind keine Produkte bezahlt, du siehst wir Kalkulieren nur das notwendigste und trotzdem wird es teuer und alleine nicht zu bewältigen.
Unsere Perks: (oder was du für deine Spenden bekommst)
(Die Perks werden auch rechts angezeigt du kannst somit auch runterscrollen zum nächsten Punkt und wenn du dich entschieden hast uns zu Unterstützen, dir genauer anschauen, was du ab wann bekommst.)
  • 1€ oder mehr -> Mit kleinen Schritten erreichen wir gemeinsam großes! Ein unendliches Dankeschön an dich.    
  • 5€ oder mehr -> Selbstloses Geben: Du bekommst ein "Dankeschön" auf unserer Webseite um der Welt zu Zeigen, dass du geholfen hast Cocojambo zu realisieren.    
  • 25€ oder mehr -> Koste ein bischen Cocojambo: Sei einer der ersten die eine 330ml Tester Packung "Cocojambo - Das gesunde Kokoswasser für alle" zu geschickt bekommen    
  • 40€ oder mehr -> Look fresh: Bekomme eins von unseren Baumwoll T-Shirt mit unserem logo und eine Cocojambo 330ml Tester Packung sowie ein Platz in unserer VIP Hall of Fame für Edle Helfer    
  • 55€ oder mehr -> VIP Vorverkauf: Sei einer der ersten die eine 5L Packung "Cocojambo - Das gesunde Kokoswasser für alle" zu geschickt bekommen sowie ein Platz in unserer VIP Hall of Fame für Edle Helfer    
  • 75€ oder mehr -> Big VIP Vorverkauf: Sei einer der ersten die eine 10L Packung "Cocojambo - Das gesunde Kokoswasser für alle" zu geschickt bekommen sowie ein Platz in unserer VIP Hall of Fame für Edle Helfer    
  • 125€ oder mehr -> Be Coco: Du bekommst eine Cocojambo 5L Packung und eine Cocojambo T-Shirt sowie ein Platz in unserer VIP Hall of Fame für Edle Helfer    
  • 135€ oder mehr -> Big Coco: Du bekommst eine Cocojambo 10L Packung und eine Cocojambo T-Shirt sowie ein Platz in unserer VIP Hall of Fame für Edle Helfer    
  • 195€ oder mehr -> Cocojambo für alle: Du bekommst eine Cocojambo 5L Packung und 7 Cocojambo T-Shirts sowie eine 6er Packung Cocojambo-Tester für dich und deine besten Freunde und Familie + ein Platz in unserer VIP Hall of Fame für Edle Helfer    
  • 250€ oder mehr -> Cocojambo Big Box für alle: Du bekommst eine Cocojambo 10L Packung und 7 Cocojambo T-Shirt sowie eine 6er Packung Cocojambo-Tester für dich und deine besten Freunde und Familie + ein Platz in unserer VIP Hall of Fame für Edle Helfer    
  • 350€ oder mehr -> Der Hauptgewinn: Ein "1-Jahres Abo Cocojambo 5L" mit 12 Lieferungen, sowie "Alle Dankeschön Produkte" (7 Cocojambo T-Shirts, 6er Cocojambo Tester) + ein Platz in unserer VIP Hall of Fame für Edle Helfer    
  • 550€ oder mehr -> Der Hauptgewinn: Ein "1-Jahres Abo Cocojambo 10L" mit 12 Lieferungen, sowie "Alle Dankeschön Produkte" (7 Cocojambo T-Shirts, 6er Cocojambo Tester) + ein Platz in unserer VIP Hall of Fame für Edle Helfer    
  • 1000€ oder mehr -> Lass dich blicken: Wir werden dein Name auf die ersten 1.000 Cocojambo 5L Packungen drucken, so kann die Welt sehen wer uns geholfen hat Cocojambo realität werden zu lassen, zusätzlich bekommst du "Alle Dankeschön Produkte" (7 Cocojambo T-Shirts, 6er Cocojambo Tester) + ein Platz in unserer VIP Hall of Fame für Edle Helfer und unsere niemals-aufhörende Liebe und Dankbarkeit!    
  • 2000€ oder mehr -> Wir werden dein Name auf die ersten 1.000 Cocojambo 10L Packungen drucken, so kann die Welt sehen wer uns geholfen hat Cocojambo realität werden zu lassen, zusätzlich bekommst du "Alle Dankeschön Produkte" (7 Cocojambo T-Shirts, 6er Cocojambo Tester) + ein Platz in unserer VIP Hall of Fame für Edle Helfer und unsere niemals-aufhörende Liebe und Dankbarkeit!    
  • 5000€ oder mehr -> Du bist ein Held!: Du kommst 2016 mit nach Sri Lanka und bist vor Ort dabei wo Cocojambo hergestellt wird. Außerdem wird dein Name mit auf den ersten 1.000 Cocojambo 5L & 10L Packungen stehen. Natürlich "Alle Dankeschön Produkte" (7 Cocojambo T-Shirts, 6er Cocojambo Tester), 1-Jahres Abo Cocojambo 10L + ein Platz in unserer VIP Hall of Fame für Edle Helfer und unsere niemals-aufhörende Liebe und Dankbarkeit.    
Was passiert mit dem Geld wenn wir die 10.000€ nicht erreichen?
Sollten wir gemeinsam die 10.000€ nicht erreichen, werden die Perks trotzdem verschickt, manches dauert dann eben ein wenig länger... Aufgeben? Walt Disney oder Thomas A. Edison haben auch nicht aufgegeben... Zum Glück!

Die Folgen

Durch deine Hilfe, kann der Kokosnussfarmer ohne Preisdumping leben und faire Löhne an seine Mitarbeiter auszahlen. Wir können die ersten und wichtigen Schritte machen um Konzepte für Regionale Bezahlungen vornehmen sodass da, wo du wohnst eine starke Regionalwährung weiter wachsen kann.

In meinem Verständnis von Wirtschaft, hat keiner "Zu wenig" oder "Zu Viel" und vor allem nicht auf dem Rücken anderer. Wir haben ein Faires und Klar ersichtliches Preis Konzept, welches wir Regelmäßig veröffentlichen und das zieht sich im ganzen Cocojambo Unternehmen durch.

Somit hilfst du nicht nur ein paar Menschen sondern den Menschen in der Ferne und in deiner Nähe. Mit dem von dir Unterstützten groß werden von Cocojambo schicken wir ein Licht an alle. Ein Licht der Menschlichkeit und der positiven Veränderung.


Ich hatte schon zwei Unternehmen mit unterschiedlichen Konzepten und bei beiden ging ich auf die Standartmäßigen Slogans ein, (Verdiene viel, hoher Aufschlag auf das Produkt etc. um Erfolgreich zu sein) doch das war nicht was mir mein Herz in der tiefe sagte. Nach langem Anaylsieren von Firmen die es schon möglich gemacht haben mit fairer und offener Preispolitik wie die Legendäre "Teekampagne" von einem meiner großen Vorbilder "Günter Faltin", hörte ich auf mein Herz und entwickelte Cocojambo.

Mit Cocojambo unterstützt du nicht nur eine Idee sondern ein durchdachtes und entwickeltes neues Soziales Unternehmen, welches mit Herz und Leidenschaft geführt wird.

Risiken & Herausforderungen

Die größten und wichtigsten Punkte, sind die hervorragende Qualität und Reinheit an Kokoswasser zu gewährleisten, so dass jeder Tropfen auch zur Gesundheit beiträgt.

Einer meiner großen Vorbilder "Robert Bosch" sagte einst "Es war mir immer ein unerträglicher Gedanke, es könne jemand bei der Prüfung eines meiner Erzeugnisse nachweisen, dass ich irgendwie Minderwertiges leiste. Deshalb habe ich stets versucht, nur Arbeit hinauszugeben, die jeder sachlichen Prüfung standhielt, also sozusagen vom Besten das Beste war." Und genau da knüpfen wir an, ich möchte das jeder Tropfen Kokoswasser, das Heil der Menschen die es kaufen wird.

Deshalb haben wir sehr engen und direkten Kontakt mit unseren Kokosfarmern um zu gewährleisten das wirklich nur Cocojambo-Qualität bei dir ankommt. Zusätzlich wird in den ersten 6 Monaten der Gründungszeit jeder Teil des Weges Dokumentiert und für euch Nachweisbar gemacht. 

Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann

Auch wenn du nichts Spenden kannst, so kannst du doch ein seeehr wichtigen Teil beitragen und zwar in dem du unsere Kampagne oder Video teilst das mag für dich eine kleine Handlung sein, aber für uns und die Menschen die alle davon Profitieren eine große Bedeutende Veränderung sein.

Von Herzen ein unendliches Danke an dich und deine Unterstützung.

Liebe Grüßle

André Fiedler, Jan Diet & Frau Maier 

euer Cocojambo-Team

Risiken & Herausforderungen  Die größten und wichtigsten Punkte, sind die hervorragende Qualität und Reinheit an Kokoswasser zu gewährleisten, so dass jeder Tropfen auch zur Gesundheit beiträgt.
Einer meiner großen Vorbilder "Robert Bosch" sagte einst "Es war mir immer ein unerträglicher Gedanke, es könne jemand bei der Prüfung eines meiner Erzeugnisse nachweisen, dass ich irgendwie Minderwertiges leiste. Deshalb habe ich stets versucht, nur Arbeit hinauszugeben, die jeder sachlichen Prüfung standhielt, also sozusagen vom Besten das Beste war." Und genau da knüpfen wir an, ich möchte das jeder Tropfen Kokoswasser, das Heil der Menschen die es kaufen wird.
Deshalb haben wir sehr engen und direkten Kontakt mit unseren Kokosfarmern um zu gewährleisten das wirklich nur Cocojambo-Qualität bei dir ankommt. Zusätzlich wird in den ersten 6 Monaten der Gründungszeit jeder Teil des Weges Dokumentiert und für euch Nachweisbar gemacht.    Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann Auch wenn du nichts Spenden kannst, so kannst du doch ein seeehr wichtigen Teil beitragen und zwar in dem du unsere Kampagne oder Video teilst das mag für dich eine kleine Handlung sein, aber für uns und die Menschen die alle davon Profitieren eine große Bedeutende Veränderung sein.
Von Herzen ein unendliches Danke an dich und deine Unterstützung.
Liebe Grüßle
André Fiedler, Jan Diet & Frau Maier 
euer Cocojambo-Team

story:
Going "Green" is great, but we decided to take it to a whole new level with PIC.  PIC (Preserve in Community) is a groundbreaking platform that creates real action to preserve and protect ecosystems around the world.

Our first PIC park


Nuestro video subtitulado al Español / Gracias por apoyarnos! 


As seen on:

  CNN Chile 

  Estrategia On-line


Publimetro


         Red Pacto Global

WHY PIC 

PIC is a platform with the ultimate goal of creating natural parks by preserving different ecosystems around the world. 

PIC’s objective is to create the largest community of preservers in the planet, by enabling people to take real action by choosing specific spots of land around the world and preserving them. 

The land that you choose will be preserved forever and you'll become a co-founder of each park in which you choose to participate in and will be able to visit this park anytime you want... for as little as 1 dollar!  

Each park has a number of PICs to be preserved (1 PIC = 1 dollar = 1 square meter). When the total number of PICs for each park is reached, a PIC PARK will be created. PIC Foundation (non-profit) will be the sole owner of each PIC PARK and will have the mission of ensuring each park is preserved in the best posible way, working with local communities and hiring environmental experts to asses the best way to preserve each park.



WHY WE'RE HERE 

We're launching this Indiegogo campaign to fund the first PIC PARK... the first natural park created by and for people!! We chose Patagonia in the south of Chile as our first PIC PARK. 

As you can see, this is a huge project with a massive impact and a global scale but we need to start with this first park to show the world that preserving our planet is something we can all do! 

We have worked tirelessly over the past year around building the technological platform which supports PIC, and now we need $200,000 to fund this first PIC Park (securing the land, hiring environmental experts to study and asses the best ways to preserve this park, building a camping site, park amenities and trails for future PIC visitors) and finish developing the technology behind PIC which will enable the preservation of countless natural parks all around the world!

THE IMPACT

This will be a real ENVIRONMENTAL REVOLUTION!

For the first time ever, preservation will be possible for anyone and anywhere, with the click of a button.  

Help us bring this amazing project to life. Our goal is not only to create the largest preservation platform in the planet, but we also want people to get involved with nature. We want people to visit the ecosystems they are preserving and see the real impact they are doing!



HOW IT WORKS & WHAT YOU GET

It's simple. A PIC is ONE dollar for ONE square meter. When you preserve a PIC, your selfie will be part of  a PIC MAP for that particular park and your name will be written on a PARK MILESTONE. The more PICs you preserve, the larger your face will be shown on the PIC MAP. You will also be able to visit the park, and you'll have access to our camping site for free!



For this Indiegogo campaign, you can preserve more meters for less money! You can also put your name or the name of a loved one in certain park spots and amenities! You want a trekking path with your name? Or maybe the camping site? 

WHO OWNS THE LAND



OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

The community is the key to making this happen. We need people to realize that a change needs to be made in order to save our planet. Even if you don't have the money right now, you can help us turn PIC into a reality by sharing this Indiegogo campaign with your friends. Just click on any of the Facebook, Twitter, and other sharing buttons to let the world know about our awesome project!


 

WHO WE ARE

We are a group of friends who share an idea and a common interest, we love nature and we know that it’s essential for life.

A year ago we decided to focus on this purpose and start this new adventure which we called PIC.


ESPAÑOL:

PIC es una plataforma con el objetivo de crear parques naturales preservando diferentes ecosistemas en todo el mundo.

El objetivo de PIC es crear la mayor comunidad de conservadores en el planeta, permitiendo a la gente tomar medidas reales eligiendo lugares específicos en todo el mundo y preservarlos.

La tierra que elijas será preservada por siempre y te convertirás en uno de los cofundadores de cada parque que preserves. Además, podrás visitar este parque cuando quieras... por solamente 1 dólar!

Cada parque tiene un número de PICs para ser preservado (1 PIC = 1 dólar = 1 metro cuadrado). Cuando se alcanza el número total de PICs para cada parque, se creará un PIC Park. PIC Foundation (sin fines de lucro) será el único propietario de cada PIC PARK y tendrá la misión de preservar ese ecosistema trabajando en conjunto con comunidades locales y contratando expertos en medio ambiente para evaluar la mejor manera de preservar cada parque .

POR QUÉ ESTAMOS AQUÍ

Estamos lanzando esta campaña en Indiegogo para financiar el primer PIC PARK... el primer parque natural creado por y para las personas! Elegimos la Patagonia Chilena para nuestro primer PIC PARK.

Como pueden ver, es un gran proyecto con un impacto masivo y global, pero tenemos que empezar con este primer parque para mostrar al mundo que la preservación de nuestro planeta es algo que podemos hacer entre todos!

Hemos trabajado durante los últimos años construyendo una plataforma tecnológica para PIC. Ahora necesitamos US$200,000 para financiar este primer PIC Park (asegurar la tierra, la contratación de expertos en medio ambiente para estudiar y evaluar la mejor manera de preservar este parque, la construcción de un camping, instalaciones básicas para el  parque, senderos para futuros visitantes PIC) y terminar el desarrollo de la tecnología detrás de PIC que permitirá la conservación de innumerables parques naturales en todo el mundo!

CÓMO FUNCIONA Y QUÉ CONSIGUE A CAMBIO

Es muy sencillo… Un PIC es un dólar por un metro cuadrado. Cuando preservas un PIC, TU SELFIE será parte del parque en nuestro PIC MAP. Tu nombre será escrito en un Gran Hito a la entrada del parque. Mientras más metros preserves, más grande será tu selfie en el PIC MAP. También podrá visitar el parque, y tendrás acceso a nuestro Camping Site GRATIS!

Para esta campaña en Indiegogo, puedes conservar más metros por menos dólares! También puedes poner tu nombre o el de un ser querido en ciertos lugares del parque! ¿Quieres un sendero con tu nombre? O tal vez el camping?

OTRAS FORMAS DE AYUDAR

La comunidad es la clave para hacer que PIC sea una realidad. Necesitamos que la gente se dé cuenta de que un cambio es necesario para salvar nuestro planeta. Incluso si no tienes dinero, puede ayudarnos a convertir PIC en una realidad al compartir esta campaña en Indiegogo con tu red de contactos. Simplemente haz clic en cualquiera de los botones de compartir en Facebook y Twitter para que el mundo sepa acerca de nuestro proyecto!

QUIÉNES SOMOS

Somos un grupo de amigos que comparten una idea y un interés común, aman la naturaleza y saben que es esencial para la vida.

Hace un año decidimos centrarnos en este proyecto y empezar nuestra aventura  llamada PIC.

story:
La Sangría es la bebida española más divertida del mundo, solo Portugal y España son los únicos que puede envasar sangría bajo esta denominación de origen.

Sangria is the most enjoyable Spanish Drink in the world. Portugal and Spain are the only ones which can bottle sangria under this designation of origin.

La sangría DON PEPE es un producto con muchos años de historia aunque la chispa saltó en el festival #ilovesucina, en una caseta de cócteles que montamos para dar mayor atractivo turístico y comenzamos a servir la sangría que mezclamos con amor y pasión desde los años 80, una sangría que fuimos evolucionando y transformando. En la inauguración de la caseta de cócteles nos dejo impresionado el hecho de que nuestra sangría que añadimos como un cóctel más, se convirtió en días, en la bebida más consumida por encima de la cerveza; entonces nos preguntamos, por qué no elaboramos esta deliciosa bebida y la embotellamos. Y la respuesta aquí esta, embarcados en un proyecto maravilloso y un producto único que queremos distribuir en cada rincón del planeta.

Sangria DON PEPE bears long years of history although the spark triggered off in the  Festival #ilovesucina, in a cocktail hut that we installed to increase the touristic appeal and we started serving the sangria that we had been mixing with love and passion since the 80´s, a sangria which has evolved and has been transformed. In the opening of our cocktails hut we were shocked by the fact that our sangria, offered just as an additional cocktail, turned in a few days, in the most consumed drink ahead of beer. Then we asked ourselves: why don't we produce this drink and bottle it? And here you are the answer; we are embarked on a wonderful project with a unique product that we want to distribute to every corner of the planet.

En el siguiente vídeo vemos una degustación de Don Pepe con un grupo de amigos.

In the following video you can watch a Don Pepe tasting with a group of friends.


La campaña es la semilla de lo que será un gran proyecto mundial de un producto muy nuestro como la Sangría.

Vamos a ser muy agradecidos con las recompensas de nuestros colaboradores, para que pueden disfrutar de una experiencia única apoyando la campaña. Los mecenas estarán siempre presentes en el camino de convertir a Don Pepe en la bebida mezclada española más consumida en el mundo.

Gracias a las aportaciones de esta campaña, conseguiremos adquirir la maquinaría necesaria para la elaboración, embotellado y distribución directa de la deliciosa sangría Don Pepe.

This campaign is the seed of what will become a big global project of a quintessential product which is the Sangria.

We are going to be very thankful with the rewards of our collaborators so that they can enjoy a unique experience in supporting the campaign. The patrons will always be present on the way to turn Don Pepe in the most consumed Spanish mixed drink in the world.

Thanks to the contributions of this campaign we will be able to purchase the machinery needed for the production, bottling and direct distribution of the delicious sangria Don Pepe. 

Lo que necesitamos

Con 24.000 euros conseguiremos poner en marcha toda la cadena necesaria para que sangría Don Pepe llegue a nuestros puntos de distribución. 

El 100 % se destinará a la adquisición de maquinaría para una elaboración segura y de calidad, detallada a continuación.

- 6 depósitos Inox. de 500 litros.

- Llenadora de 8 unidades con bomba semiautomática.

- Exprimidora de cítricos industrial.

- Etiquetadora semiautomática.

- Filtradora de placas.

- Material de laboratorio 

What we need

With 24,000 euro we will be able to start up the whole chain needed so that Don Pepe reaches our distribution points. 

100 % of this money will be allocated to the purchase of the machinery for a safe and high quality production, detailed next.

- 6 stainless steel tanks (500 litres)

- Filling station for 8 units with semi-automatic pump.

- Industrial citrus press.

- Semi-automatic labeling machine.

- Plate filtration unit.

- Lab materials.

¿Por qué la sangría Don Pepe es diferente?

Nuestra sangría se elabora en tres fases:

1.- Maceramos un excelente joven tempranillo de Jumilla con trozos frescos de manzana, pera, uva, plátano, melocotón, fresas y unas pinceladas de vainilla y canela, durante 24 horas.

2.- Exprimimos una selecta elección de naranjas, limones, mandarinas y limas en su punto óptimo de maduración y le añadimos azúcares de caña, dejando reposar otras 24 horas.

3.- Mezclamos 9 licores distintos en sus diferentes medidas y ponemos en barricas durante 24 horas.

Transcurrido ese tiempo, lo dejamos un día más para luego filtrarlo y embotellarlo.

¿Ya sabes por qué la Sangría Don Pepe es deliciosamente diferente?

Why is Sangria Don Pepe different?

Our sangria is produced in three stages: 

1. - An excellent early maturity Jumilla wine gets steeped with fresh pieces of apples, pears, grapes, bananas, peaches, strawberries and a bit of vanilla and cinnamon for 24 hours.

2. - A select range of oranges, lemons, mandarins and limes at their optimum ripening are squeezed, cane sugar is added and it all let settling for 24 hours more.

3. - It gets mixed with 9 different liquors with their corresponding amounts and placed in barrels for 24 hours.

After this time has elapsed, one more day and it gets filtered and bottled.

¿Do you already know why Sangria Don Pepe taste deliciously different?


Sistema de distribución directa y muy vanguardista.

Por medio de venta online, entrega en 24 horas desde nuestra fabrica a:

- Particulares
- Tiendas Gourmet
- Restaurantes y bares seleccionados.

DISTRIBUTION

Direct and cutting edge distribution system.

With the online sale, 24 hours delivery from our factory to:

- Final customers

- Gourmet shops

- Select restaurants and bars.


Reconocimiento y preferencias para nuestros mecenas.

- Envíos gratuitos de sus compras para siempre.

- Promociones especiales y anticipadas.

- Invitación preferente a eventos Don Pepe

Recognition and preferences for our patrons.

- Free delivery forever of their purchases.

- Special and advanced promotions.

- Preferential invitation to Don Pepe events



http://amenzing.com/024295/un-murciano-lanza-un...

Recognition and preferences for our patrons.
- Free delivery forever of their purchases.
- Special and advanced promotions.
- Preferential invitation to Don Pepe events

story:
Hub + Spoke Cycleworks is our type of community center. We fabricate, paint, customize, and build many different types of bicycles, but that is simply the material product of a lifestyle obsession we love. In more ways than one, riding bicycles and the people we have met through that act have forever changed our lives. Our main goal is to provide a space that makes this positive opportunity available to others. A place where inspiration, knowledge, creativity, and passion will always be shared. An environment that respects the individual for more than just the subculture they belong to. For us the Hub is a place where we can all feel at home.

Hub + Spoke Cycleworks is unlike any other shop in the San Diego County area. We are located at 1545 Tidelands Avenue in National City, CA approximately one mile from the San Diego city border. Our location is on the Bayshore Bikeway that completes a full loop around the southern portion of the San Diego Bay separated by the historic Coronado Bridge. Having a location with the correct industrial zoning was a priority for us in order to bring the community into the process of bicycle manufacturing. At any time of the day our customers can stop by and possibly view a bicycle frame being brazed together, a completed frame being prepped for custom paint, or a complete build happening in the service stand. Building on our sense of community we will have movie nights with a projector showing fun or historical bicycle films with seating for around 25 people, doubling as space for local bicycle advocacy meetings and bicycle maintenance classes. Finding a space with the appropriate zoning and interior space was great, but add the consistent bicycle traffic passing by daily and it created a perfect foundation to spread our message to the community.

Hub + Spoke will offer low cost, basic education classes to cyclist interested in how and why the bicycle functions as it does. The syllabus has been created, tested, and modified by our Service Manager Kate Cowper over the last year. Our classes will educate students about bicycle components, their specific functions, how to make adjustments, and even wheel truing. Classes will be kept to an intimate size of 6 people, each with their own basic tool set, so that everyone has the opportunity to have their hands on their own bicycle during the lab portion. The purpose of these classes is to empower the everyday or recreational cyclist by providing them with the knowledge to make basic repairs on the road if needed. To us this basic knowledge is just as important as keeping a patch kit and tire lever in your seat bag.

For those interested in expanding on their mechanical knowledge, we will offer a fully stocked tool bench and repair stand that will be available to rent by the hour. All tools on this bench are completely new and will be replaced as needed to insure the safety of the user. The individual will have the opportunity to perform service on their personal bicycle in a clean and safe environment. Support and final safety checks will be provided after each session by the Hub + Spoke Service Manager Kate Cowper.

Another unique aspect of Hub + Spoke is our community outreach. In the last year alone we have donated our time to help non-profit bicycle advocacy organization BikeSD by participating in free bicycle clinics for the less fortunate at Alpha Project at the downtown San Diego Library. We primarily act as mechanics in these situations, bringing tools, mobile repair stands, and tubes to get the individuals bicycles back in safe working order. With another advocacy organization, The San Diego County Bicycle Coalition, we have participated in “bicycle rodeos” at local elementary schools. These events help to teach the youth of our surrounding communities about basic bicycle safety so that they can further enjoy the act of riding bicycles later into their lives. They are also a lot of fun too. We look forward to expanding on these programs in the coming years.

What we need and why:

We are asking for funding to help us complete the building of student work benches, the purchasing of personal tool kits, syllabus materials, and some of the time we will spend hosting low cost maintenance courses and free community outreach programs. Here is a basic breakdown:

Maintenance Course personal tool kits for 6 individuals = $360.00

Work benches for 6 individuals (includes the Co-op bench) = $1000.00

Syllabus Packets for one year of classes = $1000.00

A modest fuel fund for transportation to community clinics, school rodeos, and other events.

Hub + Spoke is hoping to raise $3000 to $5000 to help us complete our projects and programs as soon as possible. We are dedicated to providing these services to the community if we reach our fundraising goal or not. In the last six months Hub + Spoke has invested over 20 thousand dollars on our dream and we want to thank everyone for their consistent love and support during this process. Regardless if you are able to provide us with a donation or not, please share our dream with your cycling friends and family. Stay classy San Diego.

story:
WIN A HOLIDAY for up to 12 people in the Sensory House

Simply share to Facebook using the button on the left then visit and 'Like' our Facebook page.  Donations welcome but not required.  Good luck in the draw.

INTRODUCING 

SENSORY HOUSE HOLIDAYS

Ordinary Holidays for Extraordinary children.

Enabling families caring for children with Social & Emotional Behavioural Difficulties (SEBD) to have a 'NORMAL' family holiday. 

WHAT IS A SENSORY HOUSE HOLIDAY

Our dream is to offer a selection of specialist sensory holiday rental homes to families caring for children with challenging behaviours.  

The house will be suitable for children and young people with  Autism, Attachment Disorder,  Sensory Perception Disorder or any condition where the child responds to a sensory environment when anxious or angry. 

Each of the specialist holiday homes  will have at least one sensory bedroom and one sensory play area.    The locations will be carefully researched and selected to provide a range of environments to suit children of differing needs.  

Our goal is to provide a variety of SENSORY resources and activities in each property.  The exact contents will differ according to the type of property but there will be core elements in all of them.  These will include:

  • sensory lighting such as multi projectors and bubble tubes.
  • soft play, tactile, fidget and chew toys. 
  • 'safe space' dens - areas where the children can 'hide' but still be safe 
  • big squidgy cushions and bean bags, lots of squidginess.
  • variable textures on floors and walls.
  • places for children to draw  and scribble - sometimes on the walls! 
  • a 'swinging' den such as a cocoon or a hammock. 
  • sand and water play will be provided in outside spaces. 
  • speaker systems so you can play your own 'white noise' or music.
We want to be create both calming and stimulating areas to help minimise anxieties for children with challenging behaviours and help them to remain calm.    


WHY

My name is Denise Searle and I'm a Therapeutic Foster Carer.  When I started caring for my foster daughter Kasey* four years ago 'normal' ceased to exist.   She is diagnosed with Attachment Disorder and has many autistic traits,  she becomes violent and destructive when anxious or scared.   Her behaviour is so challenging there are times when I can't get her to leave the house.   Going on holiday anywhere seemed an impossibility and going abroad was something I used to do.    (*name changed).

Kasey loved seeing photos of the places where I used to live in Spain, she dreamed of visiting them and I dreamed of taking her.  I spent over two years researching different strategies to help a child like Kasey be able to enjoy a 'normal' holiday abroad.   I also had to find the right environment for our holiday rental as there couldn't be too many people and it couldn't be too noisy as excessive noise and crowds are likely to cause a violent behaviour melt down.  

We finally enjoyed our first holiday abroad last year, 3 years after she first came to live with me.  Not only was it a lovely holiday for us but the experience has helped to raise her self esteem and confidence.  It has empowered her by showing her she can achieve things she thought were impossible.  

I have used my experience and research to create Sensory House Holidays with my good friend Chris who has donated the use of a property in which to create our first Sensory House.  

The first Sensory House is in the village of Torrox, a traditional whitewashed village in Andalucia, Southern Spain.   We are currently researching different locations for our second Sensory House and plan to have a variety of properties in different areas throughout Andalucia including coastal and rural locations.  

All properties will be accessible to usual holiday facilities such as beaches and water parks, bars and restaurants or inland villages, but will be located away from the centre of activity. We will select quieter locations where the families can quickly retreat to if the child is becoming anxious or distressed.

WHO IS A SENSORY HOUSE HOLIDAY FOR

Our holiday properties will be for all families and groups including birth, adoptive or foster families and residential or charitable groups - all are welcome.  They are primarily for families caring for children and young people with any SEBD condition  that may cause the children to become disruptive or violent when they become stressed or overwhelmed, but are suitable for anyone who responds to sensory therapeutic environments.  Common conditions that result in challenging behaviours are Autism, Attachment Disorders (AD), ADHD and Sensory  Perception Disorder but there are many more.

HOW WILL SENSORY ROOMS HELP

Sensory rooms are a proven therapeutic, relaxing and calming tool for children and adults. 

For children with conditions such as Autism, ADHD, AD they provide an oasis of calm  where children can regulate their anxieties and meltdowns and outbursts can be averted.  Should a child already be having an outburst a sensory room can help them to calm down quickly and control their anxiety.  

Children and young people with developmental or mental health conditions that affect behaviour can find normal, everyday activities frightening.    Simple thing like needing to pop to the shops for a pint of milk can result in a violent melt down if it's  unexpected and not part of the child's daily routine. 

Research states that the brains of children with these problems do not work the same way as 'normal' brains.  Autistic brains don't recognise signals and 'fire' in a different way.  In Attachment Disorders, the children literally have holes in their brains as a result of their early life experiences. The bits that teach us caring, compassion and how to be 'good' simply aren't there. 

(image: Dr. Bruce Perry, Reactive Attachment Disorder, society and children)

Attachment disorder is often seen in children who have been severely neglected or abused at a very young age but it can also occur in well cared for, well nurtured children who experience a trauma.  

Parents and carers of children with SEBDs really do need a break more than most yet are often unable to enjoy a relaxing holiday due the their child's behaviours which can be violent, abusive and destructive.   Carers may be frightened to take them anywhere out of the ordinary in case the child has a massive meltdown and causes upset to other holiday makers or damage to the property.  Our coaching plans will help you prepare your child for a holiday abroad and our properties will be designed in such a way that even if a child has a violent outburst damage will be minimised.  We won't mind if your child draws on our walls either!  

We will risk assess each Sensory House so that you don't have to.  We will also include additional features such as a lockable cupboard for medications  and at least one door that can be locked so vulnerable items can be kept safe if a child should become destructive.  Each Sensory House will meet the same high Health & Safety standards required for foster homes in the UK.  

If the kids are calm and happy then the parents and carers will be able to enjoy their holiday too.


PRE HOLIDAY COACHING SERVICE

Preparing your child for the journey and the holiday can be the difference between a having a successful holiday or a nightmare one.  To help you have the best holiday you can we will be offering a Pre-Holiday Coaching Service. These have been devised with the help of a social worker and successfully trialed by myself with my daughter who has AD and ASD.  There will be two plans:

  •  a 1-2-1 coaching plan via email, phone or Skype where I can help you prepare your child for the journey to the airport and the flight itself.
  • a personalised video plan for when you land in Spain. The videos will be personalised to your child and address any key phobias or triggers such as sudden noises or just fear of going to a new place.  

Both are devised to help you desensitise your child or YP to sights and sounds they will encounter and to introduce them to the places they will visit including the Sensory Holiday House itself.   Our aim is to ensure the children and YP are so  familiar with the things they will experience during their holiday that they won't become distressed - they will be expecting all of it and will be able to tell you what will happen next - this is very important for many children.  

WHAT WE'RE GIVING
We are investing our time, energy, money and experience to make this dream a reality.  Chris has donated the use of the property free of charge and is helping to modify the house.   I am doing all the promotion, fundraising, design and organising. Family members are helping out doing minor repairs and decorating,  producing the website and donating their time to help make the house ready for visitors.   Most importantly, my foster daughter Kasey will be our chief 'sensory items consultant', testing every item vigorously to ensure they make the grade and will be good enough for our visitors.  

HOW YOU CAN HELP 

We are fortunate to have the use of a large traditional six bedroom village house  but we need your help to transform it into our first Sensory House.  

Your contribution to Sensory House Holidays will help to support the initial costs of  purchasing and installing the sensory equipment and the building modifications needed.   

We need to purchase  sensory items of the highest quality we can afford due to the challenging behaviours some of our children present.   They need to be able to withstand being kicked, punched and thrown!   We will be creating two sensory bedrooms and one main play area in this first house.  

The house is habitable and doesn't need major structural work but is not suitable for what we want to use it for in it's current state.  We need to renovate and modify each room  to make it as safe and robust as possible.   We need to change or alter existing structures and furnishings to minimise the amount of damage a child could cause and to make it safe for them.   

WHAT WE WILL DO WITH THE FUNDING

We need to transform rooms like these:


Into ideas like these:

(image: autism.co.uk)

(image: ww.funkytown.co.uk)

There are numerous jobs to be completed, some of which are listed below with estimated costings:

  • New boiler for hot water - £1200
  • Safety grille over patio well £150
  • Applying 3M safety film to all small windows - £250
  • Replace patio doors with toughened safety glass version - £ 625
  • Installing multi room sound system (for white noise/music) £500
  • Replacing all (ornate glass) light fittings - £150
  • Installing keyfob locks for selected cupboards and rooms - £200
  • video recorder and editing software - £200
  • 3 x sensory lighting systems (touchwall/interactive) - £3000
This is just a small selection of what need to be done.  
We also need to purchase solid furniture that cannot easily be overturned or thrown.  Even small children can upturn furniture in an adrenaline fuelled outburst. Once the house meets the full safety specifications we can fit it out with the larger fixed sensory items and purchase the rest of the equipment. 
 I have budgeted for 3 large interactive lighting systems but this can be scaled back if we do not reach our funding goal.  £5000 won't cover everything that needs to be done but will be enough for us to make the house safe and transform it into our first Sensory House.
If we are fortunate enough to attract more funding than our original goal we will use it to provide more variety of sensory items for all ages and some will be used towards securing our next Sensory House.  

Other Ways You Can Help

If you haven't got any money then don't worry, we  need help in many ways.  Please share this message with all your friends and colleagues, your local community, schools and clubs.  'Like' and share our page on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/Sensoryhouseholidays?ref=hl and follow us on Twitter https://twitter.com/sensoryhouse.

PERKS

It is traditional to offer perks or rewards in return for your generous contributions. We would prefer to spend most of the funds raised on providing high quality sensory items for your family rather than on gifts.   We are offering a a selection of  perks including a 'shout out' on Facebook and Twitter, personal Thank You cards, Autism Awareness jewellery  and if you click the Facebook share button at the top of this page and like our Facebook page you will be entered into a free Prize Draw to WIN A HOLIDAY for up to 12 people in the Sensory House

 Thank you all for your support and Good Luck in the Prize Draw.  

Aqua Velis Waterpark, 15 minutes drive from the Sensory House Village.

We would prefer to spend most of the funds raised on providing high quality sensory items for your family rather than on gifts.   We are offering a a selection of  perks including a 'shout out' on Facebook and Twitter, personal Thank You cards, Autism Awareness jewellery  and if you click the Facebook share button at the top of this page and like our Facebook page you will be entered into a free Prize Draw to WIN A HOLIDAY for up to 12 people in the Sensory House
 Thank you all for your support and Good Luck in the Prize Draw.  


Aqua Velis Waterpark, 15 minutes drive from the Sensory House Village.

story:
Help Locals Help Themselves

Aid is flooding into Nepal, but there are several organizations, run by locals, that need your support! 

  • My Name is Rob, I’m coordinating this fundraiser to funnel funds to two great Kathmandu-based businesses that are providing direct relief on the ground. (more on me below)
  • We are supporting two Kathmandu based businesses: 
  1. Smart Paani - a water purification company that will install water purification systems desperately needed around the city.
  2. Himalayan Single Track - A bicycle touring company using Nepali Athletes to deliver aid by bike to hard to reach areas. 
Check out the guys in action: http://ibnlive.in.com/videos/542677/nepal-earth...


What We Need & What You Get

Every dollar you send will go directly towards helping Nepal.

The more we raise the more we help. We have 2 major goals:

  1. Build water purification systems around the Kathmandu Valley. The Smart Paani Team is currently doing needs assessments. We will update with specifics as soon as we have them. 
  2. Load up Nepali cyclists and get aid to those who need it quickly and efficiently. 
  • Let’s help Nepali people to help clean up their own country. Nepali people aren’t helpless victims.
  • If we raise more, we will add additional local organizations to support. 
What you get:
  • We are working on some great perks to reward you for your help. Feel free to pick one or donate without a perk. 
  • Want to donate a perk? Email us. 

The Impact

Who are we helping?

  • This money will go directly to those in need. 
  • Stay tuned for updates on the work your donations are doing. 
  • More info on our partners here:
Smart Paani: http://smartpaani.com

Smart Paani is a Kathmandu based water systems company. Their team consists of experts in designing water management systems at the household and institutional levels. Their technicians have installed more than 300 systems in Kathmandu. Their management team and advisory board have experts with years of experience with rainwater harvesting, water recycling, and filtration. Clean water will be one of the most urgent needs over the coming weeks to help prevent the spread of disease and keep people healthy. 

Himalayan Single Track: http://himalayansingletrack.com
Himalayan Single Track and the Nepal Cyclists Ride to Rescue (NCRR - see the Facebook Link) are doing something truly innovative. They have mobilized the Nepali National mountain bike team to deliver supplies and aid to the people who need it. They are utilizing local knowledge to coordinate the relief effort and need your help! See them featured here: http://ibnlive.in.com/videos/542677/nepal-earthquake-cyclists-rescue-woman-her-son-from-under-rubble.html
And read their blog here: http://nepalcyclistsridetorescue.blogspot.com/2015/04/ncrr-update-ncrr-are-currently-making.html 

Risks & Challenges 

There are a lot of charities out there, why trust us?
  • There are a lot of fantastic organizations that are well-vetted and can do a lot of good, by all means give to them if that makes you more comfortable.
  • But we are partnering with trusted, well established businesses that are well connected and are tuned in to what people on the ground need right now.  
  • There is always a risk that these funds will be used poorly by those to whom they are given, this is a risk whenever you donate money and we appreciate your trust. 


Who am I?

  • Robert Burnett - I have been to Nepal 5 times since 2007 as a student, entrepreneur and athlete. My company, Nepali Tea Traders helps local farmers sell their premium tea in the US. If you want to know more about this campaign or have general questions, feel free to email: robertgburnett@gmail.com
  • I have personal connections with both organizations we will be donating to ad I trust them to put your $ to work in an efficient and effective way. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word! Or, donate to any of these worthy organizations:

  • Charity Navigator is a great tool, if you don’t give to us please donate to any of these great organizations: http://www.charitynavigator.org/index.cfm?bay=c... 
Other media:
https://veritesoutanbou.wordpress.com/2015/04/25/a-message-from-haiti-to-nepal/
http://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2015/apr/27/earthquake-nepal-dont-rush-help-volunteers-aid
http://www.nytimes.com/2015/04/28/world/asia/nepal-earthquake.html?emc=edit_tnt_20150427&nlid=55237172&tntemail0=y&_r=1

story:
Short Bio


We are a multi-ethnic/cultural, fully operational Masjid located in the heart of the city of Paterson NJ, providing a wide range of services and assistance to the community and public in general. Here at Masjid Ansar As-Sunnah we have traversed upon the lofty goal of establishing a community for the sake of Allah, which is based upon the light and guidance from the Qur’an and the Sunnah of our messenger (peace and blessings be upon him) and the rightly guided predecessors. Over the course of the last few years, we have experienced exponential growth in our community, seeing people from different ethnic backgrounds and cultures coming together for the sake of Allah. Our intentions are the same; seeking to learn Islam and applying it in our lives hoping for Allah’s Mercy and the reward of paradise.

Needs and Benefits

Inshaa’Allah Ta’ala the Building Fundraising Project is the first of many more building blocks towards the successful development of Masjid Ansar as-Sunnah.

 We need $100,000 to sign the contract to gain entrance to the new Masjid, $550,000 to purchase the building entirely. All funds will go to the purchase of the building.

By donating you will be helping us to obtain a Masjid where we can have Arabic, Qur’an and Islamic study classes for children and adults alike.

As well as, bringing scholars in to benefit the Muslim community. By donating you will be aiding us in helping the community by giving us the space we need to give clothing and food to the needy.

And we ask that you get the word out and make some noise about OUR campaign and let the world know what we are trying to do. 

You can also do this by using the Indiegogo share tools!

It was narrated from 'Amr bin 'Abasah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:

"Whoever builds a Masjid in which Allah is remembered, Allah, (the Mighty and Sublime) will build for him a house in Paradise."

[Sunan an-Nasa'i 688]

Jazakallah Khair, may Allah increase you in wealth and He bless you with the good in this life and the hereafter, Ameen!

story:
Who doesn't love a good mystery? I know I do. I have a mystery for you but there is only one way to unlock the clues. Contribute at least $1.00 and share this campaign on all your social media sites and get your friends to contribute $1.00. As we get closer to our goal we will start to unleash the details. A dollar may not mean much to most but it means everything to me. Every single dollar is one step to opening the doors to a new exciting experience for all to enjoy. Want to know more, well you know what to do. Trust me you'll never guess what we have in store for you,  it's like mixing fire and ice. 

       I was sitting back thinking of about how I could reach a goal I set while getting other people involved and having some fun with it at the same time. Then I thought about what would catch my attention, what would make me want to be apart of something. I came up with a few ideas of course but then I thought to myself I’m a little weird so let’s not think about myself in this process. So I went back to the drawing board and I asked myself what is the least amount of money a person could ask me for that I would give without thinking about it and I said to myself $1.00. Ask yourself,How much money do you waste a day? I know I waste at least a dollar a day. Every time someone leaves a light on, or I buy coffee out instead of making it at home, every time i go to the store hungry because I always buy extra stuff or when I give that drunk asking for change money knowing he just going to get something else to get more wasted. I’m just saying we waste money every day. So then I thought what if I setup a campaign to help complete the final planning stage of my new restaurant and I could get 5000 people to give $ 1.00. What if I could start a social media movement and could get 5000 people excited about my restaurant and 5000 possible new customers and visitors to come to Atlanta, Georgia at some point. Then my weirdness kicked it and I said I think it would be fun to set it up as a mystery and unveil clues as we get closer to our goal. Well I did just that. Now I need your help to start this movement. I need everyone to  give just $1.00 and share it on all your social media sites, email it to people tell your people to get with my people and share with their people and so on. You get where I’m going with this. Every person that gives just $1.00 will forever be a corner stone of what I am building. No for real their name will be on a stone in the building. Check out the perks you’ll understand then. Help start a social media firestorm. Let see if we can break the Internet with our clothes on. I need everyone help and support. Someday I’m sure it will come back around.

story:
Cijela Hrvatska zna...

Agoniji koju su prolazile radnice Kamenskog svjedočila je cijela Hrvatska. U medijima se o njihovoj priči govorilo svakodnevno, pa ipak, unatoč pritisku medija i javnosti, one su bačene na cestu. Sedma godina teče kako se bore za svoje neisplaćene minimalne plaće i otpremnine.

  • Gašenjem tvornice Kamensko bez posla ostalo je 426 ljudi!

Trenutno je u Udruzi Kamensko zaposleno osam ljudi, a uz njih radi i pet volontera. Nedavno su posao u Udruzi dobile dvije žene iz propalog DTR-a, a žene iz Udruge planiraju zaposliti još dvije koje su ostale bez posla u DTR-u.

Kada Udruga Kamensko nabavi potrebne strojeve, u planu im je proizvoditi i košulje kakve je nekada proizvodio DTR. Njihovi sadašnji strojevi su za kućnu uporabu, te nisu u mogućnosti raditi i preuzimati zahtjevnije poslove. Strojevi koji su im potrebni omogućit će im proizvodnju, kvalitetu i konkurentnost na tekstilnom tržištu, ne samo domaćem nego i stranom. Time bi Udruga Kamensko mogla opstati, te se uz puno truda i rada, i uz njihovo dugogodišnje iskustvo, profilirati u ozbiljno ime na tekstilnoj sceni.

  • Od svih zaposlenih u udruzi, jedan je muškarac, blažen među hrabrim ženama, koje su postale simbol borbe za prava radnika!

 

Novi početak

Zajedništvom želimo vratiti nadu svima kojima je potrebna nova šansa. Životni pad ne smije biti kraj, nego novi početak.

Radnici Kamenskog prošli su težak put u zadnjih sedam godina, ali nisu digli ruke od samih sebe, nisu odustali. Sami su se organizirali i počeli proizvodnju na kućnim strojevima za šivanje. Svojim radom uspiju svaki mjesec zaraditi dovoljno za pokrivanje plaća, doprinosa i režija, ali uvijek im nedostaje novac za kupnju profesionalnih strojeva kojima bi ubrzali proizvodni proces i time smanjili cijenu proizvoda i bili konkurentni na tržištu.

Zbog toga je pokrenuta ova kampanja. Hrvatska je puno puta kroz slične kampanje dokazala kako ima veliko srce, pa to može učiniti i ovaj puta!

 

Strojevi i materijal

Novac skupljen kroz ovu kampanju iskoristit će se za nekoliko stvari, a to su:

  • Kupnja strojeva za proizvodnju
  • Nabavka potrebnog materijala za proizvodnju (tekstil, etikete itd.)
  • Organiziranje proizvodnje modne linije koja će ići na tržište.

 

Modne linije

Trenutačno, dobar dio vremena radnici Udruge rade robu po narudžbi, popravke odjeće koju im donose građani, a dosta vremena gube i zbog toga što rade na strojevima na kojima je potrebno dosta vremena da se neki proizvodni proces završi. Dosta toga rade i ručno, jer nemaju strojeve kojima bi brže i jednostavnije odradili neki posao. 

Novi strojevi ubrzat će sve te procese, odnosno značajno ih skratiti, tako da će radnici u istom vremenu moći proizvesti više proizvoda. Tako će moći stvoriti vlastite modne linije, ali i prihvaćati poslove za vanjske naručitelje, koje će moći odraditi brže i kvalitetnije.

  • Vaše donacije pomoći će u tome.
  • Donacijom ćete postati dio jedne velike priče, kojom će ovi radnici koji dugo čekaju pravdu, stati na noge i postati bitan čimbenik na tržištu.

 

Vaša podrška

Podrži hrabrost, odvažnost, trud i rad! Podrži hrabre žene iz udruge "Kamensko". Početi iznova nije lak posao, ali ako nam pružite ruku, lakše ćemo graditi iznova ono što je nepravedno uništeno.

 

Trgovina i internet dućan

Pored pokretanja proizvodnje i zapošljavanja novih radnika, cilj nam je i da Udruga Kamensko otvori prvu fizičku trgovinu, za početak u Zagrebu, te svoj internet dućan, putem kojeg bi se proizvodi mogli naručivati iz svih krajeva Hrvatske, ali i Europe i svijeta.
