Why should I support this park?
This is a park designed with the needs of our local community in mind. We want the general public to get excited about this new addition and the positive change it will bring to our communities! 
What makes this park different?The Sensory Park and Playground, the first of its kind in the nation, was developed in conjunction with national experts in the creation of living and recreational spaces for individuals with disabilities. The park features seven elements of inclusive play (please see below) that will make this a friendly play space for children with ASD diagnoses and their 'neurotypical' peers. 
Where will the park be located?The Sensory Park & Playground will be located on over an acre of Glade Run’s Zelienople campus with easy access to interstate 79 and the Pennsylvania Turnpike.
Who will get to use the park?
Everyone! While this park was designed to specifically meet the needs of kids with autism, it will be FREE and open to the general public and able to be used by all children. 






The Sensory Park
and Playground includes several essential elements for inclusive play:
1.  Bolting can be
an issue for children with autism, so a perimeter fence with only one or two
ways in and out help to maintain security and safety. The perimeter fence is
being constructed with materials salvaged from the deconstruction of historic
agency building to preserve aspects of the agency’s history during the
transformation.
2.  Vast,
unorganized spaces make it difficult for some children to engage in activities.
Clear way-finding and delineation of activity zones are essential to the
development of the park, and reduce the stress of children as well as their parents.
The shape of the play spaces will be ovals, which are comfortable and natural
shapes for children on the autism spectrum to move within.
3.  Overstimulation
is often a barrier to children with autism spending time outdoors. Nature can
set a serene tone and calm children, so soothing and safe areas are included in
the design. Paths and landscaping allow for separation between activities. Cozy
spaces for retreat and de-escalation are provided as well as areas to observe
activities from a distance before engaging physically in play. 
4.  Sensory elements
are key to the creation of this unique sensory play area. Children with autism
have over- or under-responsive sensory systems. Providing various sensory
elements in the park can both soothe and stimulate children. Examples of
elements include auditory (chimes, music), visual (movement, muted colors),
scent (flowers, grass. plants) and touch (water, textured surfaces). Ample
space for running and exercise is vital for all children. 
5.  Play should
increase motor skills, coordination, balance, and movement. Activities in the
park enhance body awareness and motion. Physical elements include equipment
that spins, slides, swings, and bounces. Opportunities for rocking, climbing,
crawling, balancing, jumping, walking and running are also incorporated through
the park’s design and equipment. 
6.  Opportunity for
social skills development in the park provide children with autism spectrum
disorders a venue for engaging and interacting with other children while also
providing space for individualized play. Many pieces on the playground require
more than one person to operate, sparking social interaction.
7.  Finally, the
park will include amenities that make it comfortable and pleasant for both
children and families, including shelters, restrooms, covered and open picnic
areas, benches, paths and hardscapes, efficient lighting, and landscaping.





Founded
in 1854 as the Orphan’s Home and Farm School, today Glade Run serves thousands
of traumatized youth through educational, mental health, cultural and autism
programs in residential school and community settings. Glade Run employs over
550 dedicated professionals to care for over 4,000 unduplicated individuals
each year. Over 70% of individuals we serve are youth under age 21, and are
referred for services from over 43 counties and 50 school districts across
Western Pennsylvania.


Our
mission – linking faith and service – epitomizes our dedication to serving
those upon which others have given up. Glade Run was created to serve vulnerable
children and families in need with programs and services that succeed where
others have failed. Our goal is to provide critical and strategic service to
the community through exceptional quality programs for traumatized children and
families in a safe environment. 
On our historic 331-acre
campus located in Zelienople, PA, Glade Run serves children ages 6 to 21
through a residential treatment facility and through K-12 education at St.
Stephen’s Academy – our licensed private school.  Glade Run also offers community based
services through offices located in Butler, Beaver Falls, Cranberry and
Pittsburgh. Programs include wraparound services for children with autism as
well as individual and family mental health and partnership programs. Through
community based services, families are kept together, and children are able to
begin the process of healing by learning how to use their unique strengths to
lead productive lives in their own homes and communities. Additional
information on Glade Run’s programs and services can be found at
www.gladerun.org.

story:
Wreckin' Ball Helmets (WBH) - Origins

Gregg Wilson, the inventor of the WBH, was always an avid fan of organized sports. During his younger years as an officer in the Canadian Air Force, his peers and himself often wore their military issued helmets during BBQ’s and social gatherings for a good laugh and to generate a fun environment.  He eventually called upon this early experience and ultimately invented the latest innovation of novelty headwear known as the “Wreckin’ Ball”. 

The appeal of this product transcends virtually all working classes, backgrounds, nationalities, genders and ages. 

KIDS LOVE THE WRECKIN' BALL HELMETS!

Varying versions of the Wreckin’ Ball have been depicted in over 100 publications worldwide, shown in 30+ television appearances, and has made countless Jumbo-Tron appearances.  It is truly the ultimate attention grabber.

  • Whether it’s your favorite sports team or an annual social gathering, simply place one of our light-weight Wreckin’ Ball Helmets on your head and the work is done. You’ll be the life of the party! 
  • YOUR contribution will ensure that YOU are one of the first people in your circles to capitalize on this new "guaranteed-attention" Spirit Wear Head-Gear!
  • Wreckin' Ball Helmets are also great for Corporate Events & Promotions!

What's in it for YOU?

  • When you support our Campaign, you'll get in on the ground floor of a new, fun & show-stopping Spirit-Wear Gadget, guaranteed to draw attention to YOU!
  • The Wreckin' Ball Helmets will retail for $89.95 - YOU will enjoy them at a significant DISCOUNT when you support our Campaign at the $50+ Level.
  • We appreciate any level of support, and at all but one of the lower contribution levels, you'll be introduced to another unique & high-quality perk - ARMFLAGS! Moisture-Wicking & Breathable (Nylon+Spandex) Arm Sleeves with UPF50+

Shape the Future Look of Stadiums & Arena Fans

Your contribution will have a major impact on our ability to bring the Wreckin' Ball Helmets to the various sports markets. 

Football, Baseball, Basketball or Soccer - for Professional, Collegiate or Amateur Leagues, we need YOU - the Fanatic Supporter!

Funds raised through IndieGoGo will go towards:

  • Initial Inventory build-up of the different WBH Designs
  • Application Fees for Licensing Agreements (Collegiate & Pro Leagues)
  • Required Pre-Payment of Royalties related to above Licensing Agreements.

Wreckin' Ball Helmets Info
  • Light Weight (Less than 1.5Lbs)
  • Auto-adjustable for 3 Sizes (S, M, and L)
  • Never to be used as a safety device and/or to protect your head in any way shape or form. Wreckin' Ball Helmets are purely decorative, as part of spirit outfits/costumes.

Other Ways You Can Help...

We understand that some people just can't afford to contribute, but that doesn't mean YOU can't help - using the Indiegogo share tools is a great way to help us out!

  • Please help us get the word out about Wreckin' Ball Helmets and make some noise about our campaign using your Social Media Accounts.
  • Please Email/Facebook/Tweet our Campaign Link to Friends & Family:  http://igg.me/at/WreckinBallHelmets

We Sincerely THANK YOU for your Consideration & Support!

The BALL is in your court!

Warm regards,

Gregg Wilson, Michael O'Leary & Jonas Thelin- The Wreckin' Ball/ARMFLAGS Crew

story:
The BWC is an all-volunteer, citizen-driven team with the goal of getting our community to work together towards improving areas around Port Dalhousie. 

Port Dalhousie has a unique character that is enhanced by its natural surroundings and by the people that live here.

It is the general consensus of the committee that certain areas within Port Dalhousie could be improved upon.

The BWC is not looking for “cheap, fast fixes”, Our goal is to ensure quality workmanship that reflects the style and character of the unique past, present, and future of Port Dalhousie.

The BWC believes in team work, community participation, and inclusive membership.

The BWC was birthed from the idea that a private citizen group of volunteers can work together to achieve positive results that benefit the City of St. Catharines and its waterfront jewel. Building positive relationships throughout our community, and gaining their support. Meaningful change can and will happen.

These projects have been identified with input from the community and vary in scope from short term(Streetscaping)to long term(Tow Horse Statue)

  1. Statue of a tow horse and schooner
  2. Community garden and streetscaping
  3. Creation of a public viewing area on Bayview Ave
  4. Heritage signs
  5. Replace chain link fence with wrought iron on public lands
  6. Development of the harbour area directly behind Pier 61 and the Legion
  7. Lock 1 canal 2 (directly across from Murphy’s)
  8. Abbey Mews park safety issues (perhaps a community garden also)
  9. Protection of the lighthouses and development of a long term plan
  10. Replacement of metallic road barriers with something more empathetic
Please help up showcase Port Dalhousie's beauty for the world to see this summer for the Pan Am games, as well as for years to come.
You can check out more information on the Port Dalhousie Beatification and Works Committee facebook page @ www.facebook.com/670131213103587

story:
Short Summary

Irrational optimism is the fuel and the pursuit of a passion is the fire. All he needs now is some community support to launch his ambition off the ground. A mobile car wash may not be the most glamourus endeavor, but its the satisfaction he obtains when working precious metals in to beautiful works of art.

His enthusiasm for the car wash business began as a hobby, way back in 2004, where he would take great pride in shining cars for friends and family. After years of trying to find his niche he eventually came to the realization that getting paid for something you enjoy should be the ultimate goal. So for the past two years he has been patiently, yet fervently,  pursuing this passion which is now coming into fruition.

He has managed to bootstrap himself into the business with branding and marketing assistance from local friends and family. Unfortunately, he is still missing a few key pieces to becoming a fully operable business (Listed Below).

  • Enclosed Trailer $3,500.00
  • Dual Action Polisher $350.00
  • Logo Laminate for Trailer $500.00

The true goal is to get $3,500.00 to purchase the "Enclosed Trailer". Everything else would be a bonus. He is currently hauling his equipment around in a 1996 Ford Explorer with very limited capacity (See Images).

The Impact

Once the financial goals are achieved he plans on further optimizing the business. The vision is to "Go Green" and become an environmentally friendly car wash. With our impending water shortages in California he plans on mitigating this problem by adopting methods to conserve water by operating a water collection and filtration system.

  • Water Containment Mat & Water Reclamation System $599.99
The water containment mat is the best solution for complying with water runoff regulations. EPA mandates and local laws often require containment and disposal of water runoff to prevent fouling of natural water resources and environmental contamination.

Risks & Challenges

The risk is minimal, and the challenge is great, but this endeavor is not out of reach. He is currently gathering support from locals in his community via word of mouth and business opportunities. So whether or not he gets the contributions he needs it will only be a matter of time before he hustles his way to success.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • If you know somebody, that knows somebody, that knows something about it, let them know.
"Find your passion and figure out how to get paid for it."

story:
Hi, I’m Terence Rogers, Chef & Owner of TBD Foods, a personal chef and catering company. Over the past year and a half, we’ve hosted farm-to-table dinner parties for hundreds of people out of my apartment. I started this with only a few dollars in my bank account and a bare bones kitchen. Now, we’ve grown so much we can’t keep up with the demand for our events. So I’m asking for your help!


What We Do

Our events allow for intimate dining between guests and the chef in a family-style atmosphere, where diners can meet new friends over the greatest pastime: food. This allows diners to interact directly with their chef and learn about the food, where it came from, and explore the inspiration behind each dish. It is truly a unique experience.


In addition to our private dinner parties, we also provide catering and personal chef services. Folks enjoy the food and experience so much that over 60% of our customers come back for more.


What We Need & What You Get

With equipment like a smoker and curing fridge, we can make more of our products in house. With matching plates and more comfortable chairs, we can provide an even better dining experience. And with a commercial kitchen space we can host more events, store more food, and reduce our costs, which means better deals and more food for you. If we surpass our goal, we may even be able to open a food truck in Boston so that we can bring our food to you 7 days a week.

To help us reach our goal, we're offering discounts on our services and even some exclusive services not offered on our website. All perks will be AVAILABLE IMMEDIATELY after you complete the checkout page. That's right. Once your support TBD Foods, you can go to our Book a Chef page THAT SAME DAY to schedule your cooking service!

Other Ways You Can Help

Strapped for cash? Believe me, I understand. If you can’t contribute financially, you can still help us out by spreading the word on Facebook, Twitter, and outside the digital world. If you’ve dined with us, you can leave us a review on Yelp, Facebook, or Google Plus. Any support is greatly appreciated!

story:
Breve reseña

Hola. Muchos me preguntan porque no hice y no hago mas competiciones de descenso. Facil, porque es mucho dinero. Y que todo lo que hice hasta ahora me lo pague yo! Nunca tuve esponsor y menos ayuda del club o de la federacion de cyclismo de Andorra porque soy Francesa pero residente de Andorra. El mundial me lo pago (130 euros) mi novio de regalo de cumple años y por suerte Commençal me dejaron una bici para poder participar. Para eso estoy muy contenta de mi titulo que recivi el jueves pasado, una recompesa de todos mi esfuersos!


Para  mi es una persona con un gran valor y una gran amistat y como  siempre en este pais que solo ayudan a los  que tienen......

Los que se lo merecen no tienen oportunidad de demostrar de que son capaces de hacer de demostrar que lo imposible es posible de que no solo unos cuantos pueden hacer cosas increibles sino que todos podemos hacerlo si lo intentamos y nos dejan.

Los jovenes son el futuro y nosotros el presente ,ayudar alos jovenes es tener un futuro.

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

Lo que necesitamos es dinero asi de facil para poder subvencionar las carreras y el material de repuesto  de la bicicleta, para poder demostar que los sueños no son imposibles.

Obtienes la satisfacción de ayudar a alguien a conseguir su sueño.

El impacto

Esta reseña es,  a una semana antes del campeonato del mundo donde a ganado la medalla de ORO para que veas lo dispuesta que esta.

 Bueno pues vamos aparcando la bici de momento. Caida estupida hoy en el bike park. Mano y pierna inflado. Haver el medico mañana...

Riesgos y desafíos

Los riesgos no conseguir nada pero da igual todo es un sueño. 

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar


  • Difundir  la campaña y que genere eco.
  • Use las herramientas para compartir de Indiegogo
  • .Buscar alternativas 

Y eso es todo.

story:
About the CEO

I have been interested in business my whole life and have had my own business most of my professional life in sales and services. I have a degree as an International Key Account Manager and am now studying IT Project Management.

I love working with people. I´ve have studied 8 languages and am recently planning to study another one. So I am very goal oriented and believe in hard work to achieving ones goals.

Something that lies very close to my heart is children. I believe that we can shape the world by the way we raise our children. That is why i am starting this project and will hopefully be able to make a difference



We have listed some questions you may have and the answers to them. If you have any questions, don’t hesitate to contact us now.

Is this a new concept?

No, there are several housing facilities running successfully today.

Why set up yet another one?

Based on the migration office there will be a need for many more houses. 110 000 people will need housing within the nearest future, 50 000 of them this year and 60 000 next year based on the numbers given by the migration office. All facilities are at full capacity and we will need to open many homes.

What other benefits do you have besides your experience and education?

We have a wide contact network, speak many languages and have the tools to make this a great business. We will have a lot of focus on quality.

Are you investing any of your own money?

Yes. We will need to pay the staff for 2 two months before we get any cash flow. In order to set up this business we have already paid consultants and fees. We are also investing in the property.

Is there any profit in this business?

Yes, the profit margins are good enough to pay a full set of staff and be self sufficient.

How do you intend to pay for the food, housing and other necessities once the business is operational?

All the costs are included in a budget we present when signing with our client. The revenue we will covers all costs for each child, staff, the facility and also ensures a profit after the expenses.

Are you investing any of your own money?
Yes. We will
need to pay the staff for 2 two months before we get any cash flow. In order to
set up this business we have already paid consultants and fees. We are also
investing in the property.
Is there any profit in this business?
Yes, the
profit margins are good enough to pay a full set of staff and be self
sufficient.
How do you intend to pay for the food,
housing and other necessities once the business is operational?
All the costs
are included in a budget we present when signing with our client. The revenue
we will covers all costs for each child, staff, the facility and also ensures a
profit after the expenses.

story:
We want to raise money for the Movember Foundation, and since only one of us can grow a moustache, we decided to get thinking. If backed, we stand to raise £750+ for charity!

It’s well known that post-Movember is the time of year when people catch colds. Standard over-the-counter mentholated medication is ineffective because it’s simply too far from your nose to help you breathe effectively.

Our solution is simple, we decided to infuse moustache wax with a mentholated topical cream. This provides an effective barrier to the skin to stop sensitivity while providing stronger relief than any other remedy currently in the market.


After weeks of testing the product’s composition and effectiveness we moved into design, resulting in VapoMo Wax. A moustache wax that allows help mustachioed Movember money raisers get through the flu season.

And it really does smell amazing.

In order to raise as much as we can for Movember, we need your support.

We're only selling 100 limited edition tubs of VapoMo wax, to buy one please select our £10 perk. And if you don’t, but like the idea anyway, why not show your appreciation with a little donation?

As a young advertising placement team, we have little money so we’ve had to pull in a lot of favours to get this far. The success of this campaign would mean the world to us.


So please share this link with all your friends, colleagues and relatives and spread the word to ensure that our fundraising is a success.


Thank you for your time and support.


Creative Love,


Ant & Zish Creative Team

www.antandzish.com

story:
It’s a common problem to do micro moves in the city. The traditional methods of borrowing a pickup, renting a van from UHAUL or hiring a moving company are either inconvenient, or expensive, or time consuming.

Together with my team, we provide the revolutionary solution for real time and on-demand delivery service. This is VanMile, the smart phone app that connects the driver and the consumer who need moving and delivery service. By average VanMile saves you 40% or more compared to traditional delivery options. Plus your items are insured!

Our competitive prices are as low as:
• $35/job for Pickup and one man
Including 8 miles and 30 min load/unload time;
Overflow charge at $1.6 per mile and $8 per 10 min
• $55/job for Pickup and two men
Including 8 miles and 30 min load/unload time
Overflow charge at $1.6 per mile and $10 per 10 min

Right now VanMile only serves Charlotte, Raleigh NC and Atlanta GA. We need your help and support to expand into more cities and provide the convenience to more people.

Check out our attractive perks. You can help us in different ways:

  • Donate directly through Indiegogo
  • Download VanMile app as a consumer (IOS and Android--VanMile)
  • Download VanMile Driver app to become a driver (IOS and Android--VanMile Driver)
  • Pass our information around through social media such as Facebook and Twitter

story:
Introducing Specialty Grade Coffee to Morocco! We are two guys from Austin, Texas who moved to Morocco and want to start a business that will introduce our city to the world of specialty-grade coffee. 

Morocco has a huge coffee culture, with a little cafe on every corner. But the coffee that is available is not the quality we know and love from Austin, the city of food trucks, microbreweries and specialty coffee shops.

Our goal is to sell the very best coffee in Morocco. 


We currently own a small roaster and have roasted 30 batches of green coffee beans as samples of what we want to sell in the future from places like Ethiopia, Kenya, Guatemala, and Honduras just to name a few. Beans in Morocco are plentiful but not varied. Our business will be among the first of its kind to bring high quality, Arabica beans into Morocco. We want to break the mold and bring coffee into Marrakesh from all over the world! But in order to bring enough of those beans into the country to roast and sell, we first need raise the money.

Our first pallet of beans (with shipping and import fees) will cost us just shy of $8000. A pallet has about 700 kilos of green coffee beans. Selling those beans will allow us to buy our next pallet of beans and start putting money towards a larger production roasting machine. 




We are excited about the opportunity to share our love of high-end specialty coffee with a country that consumes tons of coffee but hasn't had access to this kind of drink before. 

Thank you all so much for your help in getting this business off the ground!

How To Get Involved


  • We need your help in order to bring specialty coffee to Morocco.
  • Any gifts of $25 or more will get a coffee mug with our company logo on it. Gifts of $50 or more will receive a bag of roasted gourmet coffee from our roaster. $100 or more gets you a sample bag set of all 7 varieties that we will be buying in our first round of beans.

Risks & Challenges

We will be the first specialty-only coffee roaster in the country. there are a handful of other roasters in the country that roast lower quality beans, but there is not an existing market for specialty coffee.

We are confident that when we bring specialty coffee into the country, people will buy it. We have already roasted sample batches of beans and are sharing them with people in our city, and the feedback has been very positive.


We live in one of the biggest tourist cities in Morocco, and will have a large market of tourists and ex-pats living in Morocco that have been exposed to specialty coffee from other countries. Many have expressed to us that they cannot find suitable coffee that meets their standards in the stores and cafes in Morocco. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't support our efforts financially, we can still use your help!

  • Spread the word about our campaign. Share our page on Facebook and tell your friends about our efforts. 
  • We will readily accept creative help with branding and visual design for our company, our coffees and our blends.

story:
What is MEUS?

Model European Union Strasbourg is a multidisciplinary simulation of the European Union's institutions. The conference, which was the first of MEUs, allows young people to experience first-hand the intricacies of policy-making in the European environment.

The 2016 conference will be the landmark tenth edition of Model European Strasbourg.

Who are we?

The ever-evolving organising team is currently composed of seventy university students and young professionals from more than thirty different countries, both from within and beyond Europe’s borders. What brings us together is a passion for European culture and politics as well as enthusiasm for gathering like minded Europeans together.

The conference

For one busy week at the European Parliament in Strasbourg, 200 participants assume the roles of Chair, Interpreter, Journalist, Lobbyist, Member of the European Parliament and Minister of the Council, debating two topics at the forefront of European consciousness. This year the topic selected relate to the refugee crisis and the use of renewable energy. 

Our goals

Our ultimate objective is to provide the next generation of leaders and decision-makers with a platform on which to exercise their debating skills and understanding of the European Union’s institutions in a diplomatic setting. In addition, we aim to help them build  a large network of like minded people and to increase their employement opportunities. 

Why we need you

Our project is one of limited means. We rely on donations throughout the year from generous partners, stakeholders and people with belief in our objectives to make the experience a special one for all involved. Crowdfunding is an exciting new opportunity for us to reach more potential donors who are willing to help us out with small amounts in order to provide the best experience for our participants, the future decision makers of Europe!

story:
Short Summary

The B&O Trail story began when the Indianapolis, Decatur and Springfield Railroad was completed in 1880 and connected Indianapolis to Springfield, Illinois. Just 47 years later, this line eventually became part of the Baltimore and Ohio (B&O) Railroad and served the B&O well, through the B&O's purchase by the Chesapeake and Ohio Railroad (C&O) in 1963 to the B&O's eventual merger with the C&O into CSX Transportation in 1987.

However, the nationwide decline in railroad traffic after World World II eventually reached this line, resulting in its abandonment from 1989 to 1993.

Today, theB&O Trail Association Inc. is a nonprofit volunteer organization with a mission to convert these abandoned railroad tracks into recreational trails for our neighbors and communities.  The B&O Trail will provide both recreational and alternative transportation opportunities for people of all ages and abilities.

We are a team of citizen volunteers who have a passion for promoting pollution-free transportation alternatives, improving our quality of life, enhancing local communities, preserving a passage to our history, and providing opportunities for citizens to enjoy Indiana's natural environment.

Back in 2009 we saw the first 1000 feet of paved trail laid down just west of the Hendricks/Marion County line.  Since that time, we have paved 2.5 miles of additional trail.  It’s a good start, but to achieve our vision of a trail across Hendricks Co, we need to finish the last 16 miles of the path from Brownsburg to North Salem, IN.


What We Need & What You Get

To stay on track, our goal is to transform our community by providing an amazing trail. The ticket to this dream of ours, is being able to raise $20,000 to  contribute to the completion of the trail. Your generous contribution has three stops. 

First stop, you will be benefiting the community with a beautiful trail for families and neighbors to socialize and come together as a community. 

Second stop, you will help strengthen people by providing them a place to run, walk, and bike freely. 

Last stop, you are providing a safe and natural environment for people to focus on their workout, socialize with their neighbors, and enjoy a day with their family without the worry of motor vehicles on the wrong side of the tracks.


The Impact

This track has already made a huge impact on the communities it passes through. People of all ages, kids to seniors alike, walk the trail everyday for their health and recreation. Your contribution, will not only help to finish this project, but ensure that it will last for generations to come.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
WanderLassi is a line of really delicious and refreshing healthy probiotic yogurt drinks in  3 creative flavors; Classic Cardamom, Mango Tulsi, and Blackberry Mint. Right now, we make our products out of a shared kitchen space on Long Island. We wholesale to grocers and specialty stores in Brooklyn and Manhattan. Some of the stores you can find us at include Foragers Market, R&D Foods, Depanneur, and Jack's Stir Brew Coffee. We source organic ingredients and locally whenever possible!

So, why are we raising funds?

 We are looking for your support so we can purchase dairy processing equipment and obtain a kosher and USDA organic certification. Once we have funding we will be able to draw up plans for our a new manufacturing space, order and install our equipment, submit an application to the Kosher Union and USDA, seek approval from the New York State Department of Agriculture & Markets, and order our starting inventory of bottles and ingredients for our expanded production process.

The Impact

Using this equipment will give our lassis the longer shelf life we need to be sold to larger retail stores and to stores within the Tri-State area. We will also be able to work with distributors and significantly grow our business. 


Risks & Challenges

After the project has been funded, it is only natural that we will face challenges. One of the biggest challenges we will face is ensuring a high quality and safe finished product. The last thing we will want to do is to have to recall a batch of our lassi drinks because of contamination.

In order to avoid this issue, we will do the following

1. Work with the Northeast Center for Food Entrepreneurship to ensure that our equipment is making products that are optimal for consumption.

2. We will develop an open and direct line of communication with the New York State Department of Agriculture and Markets to inspect our process and test our products.

3. Consistently attend ongoing educational workshops and events that will keep us up to date on dairy processing standards, equipment, and quality assurance steps.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially,  you can still support our business:

  • get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • like us on social media and share our posts

story:
Short Summary

Lisa lived on and off the streets of St. Pete for many years. Homeless, drug addicted, and pregnant’ Lisa wanted so badly to change and be a good mother, but at 26 found herself unable to escape the lifestyle. With tears and hope Lisa signed over her rights to be Hannah’s mother.  Then Lisa got completely clean, became an RN and a productive member of society.  Haunted with guilt and loss, Lisa had to “pay it forward”.  Remembering life on the street made Lisa grow passionate about extending her heart and her hand to the homeless which she did for 6 years.  Then in 2012, Lisa Trunzo turned her passion into a legacy by legally becoming a non-profit corporation entitled: HANNAH’S HOMELESS, INC.

What We Need & What You Get

“Each one of us can make a difference.  Together, we can make a change.” ~ Barbara Mikulski

We need you! 0k, our goal is to garner enough continued support through individual, corporate, and community donors like you to help us cushion the rising costs of daily operations so that we can continue to plant seeds of hope and propel Hannah’s Homeless towards our vision of full service operation with “grassroots” fundamentals.

With continued support from individual, corporate, and community donors, we will enable Hannah’s Homeless to expand our capabilities to include full access to medical care, shower stalls, and even transportation options.  

Please join us, invest in the members of our community who have fallen in a hole because

“No one dreams of being dirty, of having no pillow, scavenging for food, having no clean clothes, or even having to fend for their life everyday”.



Homelessness is real.  It could even happen to YOU, I know, it happened to me.  By reaching in your pocket, Hannah’s Homeless would be available if it did happen to you!

The Impact

Currently, we are serving close to 500 clients in-house monthly, as well as offering several “dignity events”, such as our annual Christmas In The Park and 2nd Chance Make-over Days.  Although the number of clients has increased by about 300% since opening our new location earlier this year, the smiles, hugs, and gratitude we receive from our clients is our true measure of success.  Hearing success stories from clients who have gone on to find work, shelter, and more importantly, the dignity they lost somewhere along the way, warms our hearts and lifts our spirits.  Seeing their transformations only further reaffirms that, though we’re still small, we are making a difference and it’s that difference that makes all of this worth it!   



RISKS & CHALLENGES

Of the 5887 people Pinellas County counted as homeless in 2014, 252 were victims of domestic abuse, 572 were diagnosed with having a physical or developmental disability, and 1 out of 10 were veterans.

As many of us have probably known the reality of being a single paycheck away from homelessness ourselves, homelessness will always exist.  Showing no bias, the reasons for homelessness vary, but the fact remains, Every single one of us has faced variations of adversity at some point in our lives. The difference is that while most of us here have the support of friends and family, access to critical resources, or other means necessary to work through the adversities, many of the members of our homeless community do not. 

Being the only resource center in Pinellas County of its kind, the biggest challenge is the potential to not be able to generate the funding necessary to remain a free alternative provider to those within our community that need it the most….


So we aren't in this thing to "end homelessness" but instead to plant seeds of hope, to offer up some dignity and self-respect by treating these folks that society shuns with open arms and bear hugs. We do make over days where clients get haircuts and shaves and clean clothes and they walk taller, smell better, feel like human beings again. And there are some we've helped, supported and cheered while they struggled to get on track. Just look through our Facebook page! We post these as much as possible, to show how proud we are of the client who put in the hard work to climb out of a hole. The risk is that we'll spend time, energy, and money and won't help everyone. The reality is that to those we can and do help, it’s worth every bit of it!!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Like Us On Facebook!Like Us on Facebook

Your support feels amazing! But we are aiming for $26,000 if you haven't donated yet - now would help us tremendously!  Pick a perk, or treat a friend to a perk - you can buy a perk in your friend or family member's name!  You can pass this along through social media, to all your email and facebook friends.

THANK YOU:  get the word out and make some noise about our campaign by using the Indiegogo share tools!  

We also appreciate In-Kind donations and Volunteers - Corporate sponsorships and bartering POSSIBILITIES. THANK YOU!

and self-respect by treating these folks that society shuns with open arms and bear
hugs. We do make over days where clients get haircuts and shaves and clean clothes
and they walk taller, smell better, feel like human beings again. And there are
some we've helped, supported and cheered while they struggled to get on track.
Just look through our Facebook page! We post these as much as possible, to show
how proud we are of the client who put in the hard work to climb out of a hole.
The risk is that we'll spend time, energy, and money and won't help everyone.
The reality is that to those we can and do help, it’s worth every bit of it!!

 

Other Ways You Can Help



Like Us On Facebook!Like Us on Facebook




Your support feels amazing! But we
are aiming for $26,000 if you haven't donated yet - now would help us
tremendously!  Pick a perk, or treat a friend to a perk - you can buy a
perk in your friend or family member's name! 
You can pass this along through social media, to all your email and
facebook friends.
THANK YOU:  get the word out and make some noise
about our campaign by using the Indiegogo share tools!  
We also appreciate In-Kind donations and Volunteers - Corporate sponsorships and bartering POSSIBILITIES. THANK YOU!

story:
Who we are? 

We are Amulya Kranti DDRC, A NGO from India, working for our society with a purpose of development. AMULYA KRANTI DDRC is a Society Registered under the Society Registration Act 1973 and working since last so many years since March 1993 in the field of Social Welfare and Upliftment of the general community in Madhya Pradesh, India, with the keen support of their members and a team of experts who are fully dedicated towards the social welfare work.


Campaign Project - "Shelter House"

Our  primary  focus  is  women  &  children,  who  doesn't  have home to live, food to eat, no parental care & SUPPORT, no livelihood and  dominated by the  entire society. We serve them as a HELPING hand. We take them to our shelter home, we  provide them  food, shelter,  education, healthy homely environment, security  and try to provide them  all  basic amenities, which a kid deserves  to develop.  In this shelter home, we keep many homeless children and women together, they all live like a family. This shelter home is known as "Shelter House"


Campaign for

                                                 "Poor Shelter Home Women"

                                                  "Poor Street Children"

Our campaign is for those homeless children and women, who doesn't have a home to live, they are very poor, So that they can't even get food to eat, clothes to wear and they live on STREETS, sleep on FOOTHPATHS or aside of railway tracks. They even rummage public dustbins for food, collect garbages. We approach to them and take them to our shelter home. We PROVIDE them House, clothes, food, shelter, security, healthy environment, education, support, care, health facilities, vocational TRAININGS and many more which strengthen and helps them to develop and make their future. We are running two shelter HOMES one  in Dist. Hoshangabad and other in dist. sehore, Madhaya Pradesh, India.


                                                       "WE ARE FROM"

                         



Campaign Purpose

We are running TWO shelters for poor homeless  children  and women, with the aid of our Indian govt.  but  due to our corrupt officers, we  didn't  received any of  the  aid  from  our  govt.  nor  by  any  other  source  from  more  than  past 5 years, but  till  yet  we  managed  to  run  these  shelters by our own, but  we are non  profit  making   NGO. So,   it’s  getting  very  difficult  for  us  to  run  these shelters. As, we all know that, a NGO WORK for social DEVELOPMENT and fight for the  evil  aspects  to  eliminate it.  So,  we  can't  help  our  govt.  officers  by PROVIDING  them  bribes,  as they wanted, for forwarding our work files to GET aid.  So, our faith on our  govt. got  fade  away. Even, we can't stop our working because  many  of  the  women and  children  are  now  dependent on us. They have faith & believe on us. 

"The main motive of this campaign is to serve them & Fulfill their dreams and making them self reliant with good careers"

                       

                                "YOUR  LITTLE  EFFORT  CAN  SAVE  A  FUTURE"

                                                    "Our Shelter House Kids"

                                                      


                                                     NO GOVT. SUPPORT

    

                     TILL YET    --------WE ARE IN MIDDLE  


                                                      NO PRIVATE SUPPORT

                                                   

Importance of Campaign 

It is important because many life and futures depend on this campaign.  A little help & effort from your side will leads to support a life and a future of little children.  With  this  camping,  we  will  able  to continue our shelters smoothly and without any interruption.

                                                  SHELTER WOMEN (WORKING)


Funds Required (Target)

Our main target is 2,00,000 USD, but we breaked it into 8 parts :


Targets

1. 1000 USD - At least this can provide some new clothes to children

2. 3,500 USD - This can help in getting some food for a period

3. 11,500 USD- This can help in maintaining roof on head for a period

4. 40,000 USD- This can help in providing some skill trainings 

5. 80,000 USD- This can fulfill all basic needs of little ones

6. 1,00,000 USD- This can make permanent sustainability of project

7. 1,60,000 USD- Finally, we should continue our shelters with no problem. Now we can go further and help more street children's and women. 

8. 2,00,000 USD- This will help in making permanent shelter Premise. 


Use of Campaign funds

The funds will directly go for the shelter inmates, These gathered fund will be used for various purpose, such as :-

  • In fulfilling basic needs (food, clothes & shelter) of women & children
  • providing education to little children 
  • providing various training to women and children like computer basic, tailoring and stitching, embroidery, etc. These training's will make them self relent.    
  • providing sufficient education material for little children
  • Providing them basic amenities
  • Health check ups 
  • Treatment of health issues in shelter women like, fainting, blood pressure problem, weakness, cancer, etc 


                              Small Kids and Women of our "Shelter House"

Please also check these Press News & Weblogs 


Blogs on street children

http://www.slumdogs.org/

News Letter:  http://www.slumdogs.org/slumdog-blog.html

NDTV: http://www.ndtv.com/mumbai-news/mumbai-9000-street-children-in-the-city-go-hungry-every-day-reveals-study-543392

The Indipendent: http://blogs.independent.co.uk/2013/10/30/indias-slumkid-reporters


SPOTLIGHT: STREET CHILDREN OF INDIA BY KRISTIAN BERTEL - PICTURES AND STORY:-

http://spotlight-by-kristian-bertel.blogspot.in/


News & Blogs on homeless women & children in India

http://www.dw.com/en/homeless-women-demand-protection-in-indian-capital/a-17024786

https://eticproject.wordpress.com/tag/homeless-women/

http://www.hindustantimes.com/newdelhi/delhi-govt-to-rehabilitate-children-begging-on-streets/article1-1380809.aspx


                       


           


                                          


What we achieve?

We achieve development of our society as well as prosperous  environment in society by reducing the poor and homeless ones. This will provide us various results, such as :-

  • Poverty Reduction
  • Reduction in the rate of beggars 
  • Healthy environment
  • Increase Rate of literacy 
  • Human Development 
  • Great feel and blessings of poor (Work for good cause)
  • Decrease rate of hunger or no hunger


What you achieve?

  • Tax rebate
  • Self Satisfaction 
  • Satisfaction of a good work
  • Great feel of donation 
  • Blessings of poor 
  • Pleasure of helping to a needy one
  • For a good Cause
  • Wow! uNIQUE perks



Funds Contribution 

It is for a good cause and it is flexible too. It is upon you, how much you can do. we understand that everyone is different, people needs are different, ways are different  and   even   economic  conditions  are  different  too. So, a very little help from your side will also really very helpful for us.



uNIQUE! Perks 


1. Oh! Fabulous Donation T-shirt (With the name logo of our organization on it...which will reminds you, that really! you did some amazing thing)

                                         "With Center Logo of your choice"


2. Om! Beautiful Indian Ganpati statue..Famous for making environment positive, peace, prosperity, happiness, success and fulfills all our wishes...Its great really! Try it once.                                                                                                                                  

                           (For more details about this, Check out our perks)


3. Tik tok tik...Amazing funky donation clock! (Not an ordinary one, its a donation clock with great blessings of little childrens....As we all know that kids are the little human form of god)


4. Oh! Great! Amazing! memento of Indian wonder "Taj Mahal" Do you ever seen it? if not then its great time to have this beautiful memento "TAJ" 

                              Really! It is very beautiful wonder...Believe or not  


5. Wow! amazing handicraft made by our shelter women

                                               "Indian Handicraft Antiques"


6. Name on wall- (We'll Engrave your name on our shelter home's wall along with your photograph)

(Isn't it great, when inmates and visitors of shelter will directly see...that who supported us.)


There are many more! Just Check It out...


"Our Achievements"
  • We trained more than 4,500 women
  • We helped over 4,000 women in establishing own business
  • We rehabilitated more then 3,000 women from shelter house
  • We rehabilitated around 500 children from shelter house
  • Around 50 children & 62 women were treated with health issues from shelter house
  • Currently more than 50 children and 100 women are living in our 2 shelter homes. 


"Project Value"

This project is very precious for us! because this fills an "stomach" & develop a future and community. It is valuable for you! because world peace and prosperity are Global missions.     

       We are from the extreme poverty Madhya Pradesh Region, India


Impact of "Contribution"

We are in a great need and we really admire, a little contribution too! May be that help us in getting our "Shelter free" from liabilities or maybe it help us in changing a life of poor one.  So, your little contribution too is very precious to us. "Please Help Us"



Challenges- "We Faced"  

  • We are in great depression and we wanted to overcome from this, because of this crisis, our work is slowing down and due to this, we shifted some of shelter women and children to some old age home or orphanage,etc but after that all, they returned back to our shelter because they are attached with us & even they don't get proper facilities & treatment their.  We really want to help them but how? we are already in crisis. 
  • We took many of loans for our "Shelter House" from various banks. we have to repay that to banks but how? banks only watch their business, sentiments and development doesn't matters to them. Really! we want to overcome from this crisis and wants to focus to achieve our targets by empowering several more inmates.
  • Govt. officers were other big tension for us, they visit our shelters several times for reporting purpose but their behavior with our women and children of shelter is very cheap & dominating. our shelters are working very finely but they send false reports to upper management, false reports like, our shelter is not working, No woman is living their, shelter is locked and many more. They false report because we don't provide bribes to them for their work and even they ask for lot of money as bribe. Here, my question is why do we provide bribes for their work? they are getting salaries and many other allowances from govt. for their work, but we never got any allowance or help, even not for a good cause. we also complained this with several upper level officers but nothing happens. Consequently inspection officers, get more aggressive on us and started more false reporting. Due to all these problems, we ended our tie up with govt. Now, we are happy and no one disturb us. But our major problem is still there! That's why we came here for your help. Please help us stop getting close down.
  • We and our inmates both do not want to closeout because we don't want that, they will be found on footpaths and seek for food and a roof again. So, this campaign is our last hope.  Please help us stop getting close down.

                                                         "Poor Street Children"


Other Ways- You Can Help Us!

If you want to help us, but you  can't contribute, then  there  is no  problem, we can understand. You can help us by several other ways. it is  equally important for us. 

  • If you like our campaign, then please at least you can promote for us, promotion of our campaign is equally, important as donations. Please support us.  
  • Indiegogo share tools! - Share this campaign as much as you can with your friends and people you know or you trust or where you think it is important to share. Please help us.  
  • Other sources of funding - Its a NGO, and we are liable to take donations and project funding's via any other sources like (Corporate) CSR funding, fundings from foundations, contribution funds, Ratio return donation and several other types of fundings. So, you can help us by providing these kind of funds or help us in getting these funding. Please help us.

       A BIG -  "THANK YOU"                                                                                             FOR YOUR INTEREST

Other Ways- You Can Help Us!
If you want to help us, but you  can't contribute, then  there  is
 no  problem, we can understand. You can help us by several other ways. 
it is  equally important for us. 
If you like our campaign, then please at least you can promote for us, promotion of our campaign is equally, important as donations. Please support us.  
Indiegogo share tools! - Share this campaign as much as you can with your friends and people you know or you trust or where you think it is important to share. Please help us.  
Other sources of funding - Its a NGO, and we are liable to 
take donations and project funding's via any other sources like 
(Corporate) CSR funding, fundings from foundations, contribution funds, 
Ratio return donation and several other types of fundings. So, you can 
help us by providing these kind of funds or help us in getting these 
funding. Please help us.

       A BIG -  "THANK YOU"                                                                                             FOR YOUR INTEREST

story:
The Rovernighter was inspired by Bronwyn (the Welsh Terrier pictured here). I was on a contract due to work on Christmas Eve before travelling 200 miles to spend Christmas with my family. I asked if Bron could come in with me so I could leave straight from the office and started thinking what would I do with her when she was in the office. A colleague jokingly said just put her in a bag and bring her in.  This made me think where would I put her when she came in and thought what if the bag converted to a bed? And the idea was born. After 2 years researching/thinking about it and development it is now ready to be manufactured and delivered to the market. 

Check out our gallery of pictures. 

The bag is lightweight, weighing in at less than 2 kg when empty, is made of ballistic nylon, which is hardwearing, completely waterproof and wipe clean, with a 'memory foam' style mattress for comfortable sleeping for your pet (with washable cover). It contains several pockets for all your pets needs, including a thermal pocket to keep food cool and fresh on your journey. The bag converts in less than 20 seconds from a bag to a bed and back again. It is fully safety and fire regulation compliant and is made with the highest grade materials, with quality workmanship and handfinishing. Built to last, be convenient and stylish, this is the pawfect pet travelling system. Demand will be high so, pre-order your bag here on the perks page and be the first get this must have accessory for the stylish pet on the go. 

Why back us?

The Rovernighter team is passionate about delivering a really unique quality product for the pet market that helps save time for the busy pet owner and provides the pet with its home comforts when it is travelling. As dedicated pet owners we understand how pets can be stressed when travelling and out of their familiar surroundings,  this product allows them to have the familiarity of their favourite things which helps reduce their stress and keep them happy. 

The Rovernighter team leader is an experienced manager, business consultant who has helped deliver and improve business performance in a number of sectors. She also has an MBA and is fully committed to delivering the vision of this product and business, with a thoroughly thought through business plan and strategy. She is also a dedicated pet lover and animal owner, so understands fully what pet owners need and want. In her life she has owned horses, cats, dogs and even at one point was the proud owner of a goat. She therefore understands the market and what pet owners want and will respond to and what pets will love. Her own dog is fussy about beds/toys and treats, but has personally given her seal of approval to the Rovernighter, so we know dogs will go barking mad for it.  She is also a qualified horse-riding instructor and enjoys getting to know and understand how animals’ behaviour is affected by their environment and our behaviour towards them. So is well placed to ensure that all products are pet friendly and deliver for both the end user and their human. 

So what is the concept? 

The Rovernighter is a compact, stylish complete travelling solution for pets. Allowing the busy owner to have all their pets needs including all their 'furkids' fav toys in one easy to transport piece. No more spending 20mins getting all their stuff together, just put in their food and favourite toy, pick it up and walk out the door. After all you don't want your baby to be lonely without their favourite cuddly toy or best ball, when s/he is going through the unsettling phase of travelling. It is stylish, time saving, totally pet focused and keeps the familiarity of home with them.

The Rovernighter is the draw for what will be a lifestyle brand, which will eventually include high quality coordinated accessories and pet related gifts. The aim is for the brand to emulate the look of designer bags (there is a bag and shoe lover behind the brand too!). So stylish, chic, totally on trend, yet timesaving and pet approved. 

What will your funding be used for? 

The product development has already been done and we are now ready to launch and need funding to deliver the first batch of bags and this unique, helpful and stylish product and brand concept to the market. 

Funding will be used for the product run, sales campaign, website development, product placement, distribution admin and promotional work. 

What impact will we make? 

This is a unique product in a market that is globally worth around £70billion a year. This will provide a solution for all that travel their pets and want a quick, stylish and comfortable solution. We have done our research and there is a strong market for this product. We know it is wanted and we know we have a product that both addresses a physical need and will also be an item that people will want to own for its style, convenience and comfort levels for their 'furbaby'. 

How can you help? 

This is an exciting journey we are taking and we have plans to make a real splash. We would love for you to be part of this journey for what is aimed to be a leader in the fashionable world of pets and accessories. We have the passion, the drive and the expertise to make this happen. We are also ensuring that we share our success with those who support us. We are employing other local small businesses to help us deliver some of this vision, for example we are employing a locally based social media expert to help us develop our social media campaign. So funding to us gets recycled into other small businesses and not just spent on large corporate agencies.

We want to grow, help people and their pets, save time, be happy and enjoy themselves. Please help us deliver this vision by supporting us and telling people about us and how they can support us too. Please help us by donating to our cause. Any amount big or small is welcome. You can simply donate or you can check out the options and perks we offer and pick the one that best suits you.

 Thanks so much

The Rovernighter Team x

    #pets #crowdfunding #travel #accessories #entrepreneur #finance #Rovernighter

story:
Introducing BuyMe4You

BuyMe4You is an App that let's you sell your Home Made Products, including Food, Beverages, Home Grown Fruit and Veggies, Hand Made Hobbies gifts, Free Time, etc to people around you. 


Why BuyMe4You

Have you ever wanted to taste a drooling recipe you saw on a friend Fb post? Do you wanna try the fabulous artisanal beer made by one of your neighbor? Have you ever considered to sell your free time to cut the grass of your old neighbor?

These are some of the questions we want to give an answer with BuyMe4You App. You can sell all your Home Made stuff, including your skills and people around you can buy them and rate your products/services.


What can You do with BuyMe4You

Who Can Use BuyMe4You

The App is just for Privates and not for professionals. Only little farms could apply for the App and sell fresh Milk, Eggs and other genuine products.

Easy to use even for grannies

BuyMe4You has been developed to be used by everyone. 


Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot help with cash pls spread the word as much as you can. More people will use the App and more offers will be available to you.

story:
.. Harry met Sally .. and we met huveja! .. our partner for life!! ;)



.. we all have a lot of dreams and goals .. and that is wonderful!! ;) ..


.. but .. we are having trouble losing weight, exercising more, learning from this subject we always wanted, writing a book, and so on .., because that means changing our behaviors .. in other words, changing our old mental and physical habits .. 


.. and bad news here! .. that is very hard .. because from the Neuroscience, we now know that the difficulty for change behavior is very real and has a biological basis, seated in the normal functioning of the human brain itself ..


 .. therefore most of the time, it is not our fault that we can not change, but it is our own brain that deceives us .. our brain is the Big Bad Wolf .. oops! ..



.. well, now I'm convinced that I am the Big Bad Wolf .. where is huveja ?? .. looks delicious ;) ..

.. just kidding!! ;) .. I think I understand what you try to say about not achieving our goals .. but who is huveja and how is huveja related with this whole situation?? ..

..  simply put .. huveja is a mobile app that help us to unleash our inner potential, or in other words, huveja  gives us the support to avoid our own brain deceiving us, and therefore making easier for us to make those behavioral changes which are required to achieve our goals ..


.. huveja helps us to domesticate our inner Big Bad Wolf, our own brain, so to put all its energy at the service of our future goals, instead of wasting this energy in bad habits from the past ..



.. well, now I know that the change is hard because our brain tends to deceive us ..  so, I want some support to change my behavior in order to achieve my goals .. how is huveja providing this support? .. is huveja a magician disguised as mobile app? ..

.. a magician? not really! .. huveja is a social technology designed especially to help to decrease the cognitive load in the process of behavioral change .. it means that by using huveja, our  cognitive styles and capacities are molded in such a way, that we become aware of when and how our brain is trying to deceive us, while at the same time, huveja is supporting us to automate the needed strategies to avoid the obstacles that our brain creates us .. and then it becomes easier for us to create the required changes from that new position ..

.. trying to facilitate with a single strategy the required change for achieving any type of goal, is almost impossible, because the specifics, resources and needs that each goal type is demanding are making necessary different strategies for each one .. therefore to overcome this limitation is that the huveja 's goals were created .. where each huveja 's goal  is a predefined goal type .. such as e.g. "Loose weight", "Exercise regularly", "Learning this subject", and so on ..

.. and for each of these predefined huveja 's goals, we work with a team of behavioral psychologists, coaches, and researchers from the field of Neuroscience and Machine Learning, with the aim of creating a behavioral model that is specific for this huveja 's goal .. and it is this developed model that that is  making easier for us to make those behavioral changes which are required to achieve our goals ..


.. the latest research in Neuroscience is elucidating the normal patterns of the brain that cause the difficulty for behavior change, and this research is also providing the means to overcome them more easily .. a huveja 's goal  is using these means tailored to  the specifics, needs and resources required by its goal type, as for example  "Loose weight" ..


.. a huveja 's goal  is based in a behavioral model that is applying Machine Learning, a branch of Artificial Intelligence, in order to personalize this model to your unique needs ..


.. a huveja 's goal  is using coaching techniques to create a motivating atmosphere for performance, in order to make real that change could be inspiring ..


.. all of us are finding difficult to go alone through the change journey .. but in huveja we are no longer alone on the path to achieve our dreams and goals .. because in huveja we are making the journey while we are developing real human relationships through interactions that matters and not mere connections ..



.. well, well .. although you almost convinced me that I'm the Big Bad Wolf .. don't worry I'm still vegetarian .. so how I can be part of huveja? ..


.. thanks for your engagement!! ;) .. right now we are finishing a private Alpha Test, and we are looking for people and resources to move to the next stage, a private Beta Testing ..


.. all of our alpha testers agree on one thing .. the current huveja 's design and usability are baa baaad .. so we want to hire a Dali UX/UI designer for the Beta Testing ..


.. from the feedback collected with the Alpha Test,  we know that huveja is asking for some tweaks.. as we are busy with the huveja 's server side code, we want to hire a magical programmer that helps us to improve the huveja 's mobile part ..


.. for the Beta Testing we want to expand the capacity of the servers running the huveja 's server side code, as for example the improved Machine Learning algorithms .. 


.. learning this subject you always wanted is a great goal by itself .. and also learning is a path to achieve another goals .. then for each additional $600  being collected in the campaign,   huveja is using them to give the opportunity to someone somewhere in the World,  to learn something new through edX, Udacity or Coursera .. 



.. and ladies and gentlemen ..

.. the show has started!!! .. given the huveja 's current state .. in just three months we can have the huveja 's new version ready for the private Beta Testing .. yes!!! ..



... aha! .. now what we all have been waiting for .. the perks!!! ;) ..

.. each perk is reflected in the film that gives it its name .. each one is a journey in time and space through the land of our collective memory and emotions .. and for the what it is now, and what will become .. we are happy to share them with you!!! .. choose one from the top-right column here!! ;) ..



.. “now we are both black sheep, mommy” ..

Jorge : a boy from Uruguay and the proud father of huveja. Right now, as a good father, he is teaching huveja the intricacies of Machine Learning, while at the same time he is desperately trying to beat huveja with the PS


Raka :  a girl from Paraguay and the  dazzled mother of huveja. As huveja is growing, she is in charge of the huveja 's social development and motivation, also she is who reads beadtime stories to huveja


Carmi :  a girl from Paraguay and the aunt that is spoiling huveja with toys and sweets. But from time to time, she wears the white coat, and controls the neurological development of huveja


You : from somewhere in the world who want to become a fierce huveja 's beta tester .. and we would love to hear about your favorite goal through: 

succinct : #huveja  at Twitter

elaborated: https://www.facebook.com/huvejas

shy: huveja at gmail.com


We also will be hiring .. so if you are an inspired UX/UI designer or mobile developer, please drop an email to huveja at gmail.com .. intrigued? .. look here the kind of things we are doing:  https://github.com/uyjco0 



..  huveja wants to give a big thanks to our exceptional collaborators!!! :) ..

Nastia : she is from Ukraine is the illustrator, motion designer and animator of the above amazing huveja 's animation. From our personal experience, she always want to get better at what she does, learning more and finding new ways to improve your original idea. 

In addition to the huveja 's animation, you can check other works from her at:

  https://vimeo.com/nastiazubova

If you are looking for the right person for your animation, she is!! For any information or just simply to say hello, please feel free to get in touch with her at: 

stasia.zubova@gmail.com


Oscar and Nico: they are from Paraguay, father and son working together doing an amazing job as sound engineers. They were in charge of that the above huveja 's animation is sounding so good!!

If you want something similar for your production, then we recommend them!! Please feel free to get in touch with them at:

http://www.lacigarramusic.com/ 



.. really? .. well, do not exaggerate .. some Guaraní ..

 huveja = hu + oveja : "hu" is "black" in Guaraní, and "oveja" is "sheep" in Spanish

hendy kavaju resa : it is an expression of surprise in Guaraní

aguyjé : it means "thanks" in Guaraní

story:
Short Summary

Founders, Mary Hagen and I, have been friends for a few years now.  Recently, after many in depth conversations about business ideas and the challenges getting to market, Voortal.com was created.  

Mary is a Digital Product Consultant who has successfully lead change in a few large companies you have likely used.  She has been the talented business partner necessary to make this idea a reality.  When Mary and I began these conversations it was her who was the jarring force for deeper thinking and leading to a better solution, so that's why I don't hold it against her for being a self-described cat lady.

By career description, I am a 10+ year sales leader in healthcare.  By heart and mind, I am an entrepreneur who has struggled having the time or money to launch various ideas.  In April 2015 knowing I had worked through a variety of quality ideas with nothing to show for it, I changed my thinking.  I stopped thinking about the challenges of launching the individual ideas and started thinking about how could I get these ideas as a whole to address societal needs.

This is why I firmly believe Voortal.com needs to make it to market, we will be giving everyone with an idea the opportunity to experience success.  Voortal.com is uniquely positioned to change the way we think about building a business and investing.  A successful story should include a single-mother who has an idea for improving a pacifier but nowhere to turn.  With the success of Voortal.com, it could change her life forever. 

What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking $50,000 for building and hosting the site, legal protection for intellectual property on the ideas coming to the site and marketing.

  • We would like to incorporate as many features as possible into the first launch some of which are imperative.  Esignature for Docs, merchant processing, and messaging platform within the site.
  • We know everyone with an idea wants some level of protection so we will have the proper documentation available to protect ideas.  This will make up our legal costs.
  • If we are unable to meet our campaign goal, we will use funds for our top two priorities.  Completion of the website and protecting intellectual property of the ideas will be receiving the funds.

The Impact

Voortal.com is going to benefit the people of the world by providing a platform for great ideas to be successful.  Voortal will create higher quality teams, services/products and companies.

Risks & Challenges

Our anticipated challenges are primarily maintaining quality of ideas and business experts.  We will be reviewing and approving all ideas to ensure they are realistic and appropriate.  Additionally, everyone must create a profile to access the site therefore all business experts will also be verified by us for experience and knowledge.  Finding the appropriate "cutoff" for ideas and experts will be critical to maintain quality but not create limitations in volume.

Our other most significant concern is the protection of these ideas and companies being built.  We have consulted with numerous attorneys to date seeking advice on the best way of protection.  We will have specifically written language to provide legal protection.  In addition, we will be using a proprietary software that crawls the entire internet seeking plagiarism of content.  Once ideas are posted we will be able to search for "like" content to help ensure protection

Other Ways You Can Help

If you aren't able to make a monetary contribution to the campaign, you can also build the value of the site by becoming a Creative with an idea or a Brain as a verified business expert.  You can go now to www.Voortal.com and pre-register for launch.

story:
¿Por qué esta campaña y por qué ahora?

STOP Gordofobia es una comunidad que realiza su actividad a través de una página de la red social Facebook y que, actualmente, cuenta con más de 31.200 miembros (y subiendo). 

Facebook ofrece muchas ventajas para la creación de comunidades como la nuestra, sin embargo, sus políticas censuran cierto tipo de contenidos que para nosotras resultan importantes. Otra limitación de esta red social es que lo que en ella se comparte, se va perdiendo en una time line infinita, sin que podamos rescatar conclusiones interesantes referente a la gordofobia y sus implicaciones.

Por todo ello, concluimos que necesitamos más espacio, la página de Facebook se nos empieza a quedar pequeña. Y pensamos que una página web propia nos permitiría expandirnos sin límites.

Eso si, ¡no podemos lograrlo sin tu ayuda!

¿Qué necesitamos y qué obtienes tú a cambio? 

Crear esta página web y mantenerla en buenas condiciones para que se convierta en una buena plataforma de expansión de nuestra comunidad cuesta dinero. Por desgracia, las personas que administramos STOP Gordofobia realizamos esta actividad como  una forma de activismo personal y no contamos con recursos económicos para poder hacer frente a dichos gastos. 


Es por ello que necesitamos esos 600 € por lo que insistimos: ¡te necesitamos! 

¿A dónde irían destinados?, pues a:
  • Comprar el/los dominio/s de la web
  • Costear un buen hosting (capacidad de almacenamiento de la web ) que nos  permita afrontar la inmensa cantidad de imágenes, testimonios, recursos y apuntes teóricos que se generan en la comunidad
  • Adquirir un buen sistema anti-hacker
  • Contratar a un diseñador web
  • Crear y enviar las recompensas a quienes aporten su granito de arena
Y, en caso de que sobrase dinero, este se guardaría para hacer frente a los gastos anuales por la compra del dominio o para aumentar la capacidad de la propia página web.

En un apartado posterior explicamos las recompensas que ofrecemos para las personas que deseen aportar su granito de arena a nuestra causa.

¿Por qué ayudar a STOP Gordofobia? 

Porque queremos cambiar el mundo. Queremos seguir luchando por una sociedad libre de discriminación hacia las personas gordas, libre de complejos hacia nuestros cuerpos. Una sociedad que celebre la diversidad en todas sus formas. En definitiva, queremos hacer realidad nuestra principal consigna: ¡TODOS LOS CUERPOS, TODAS LAS BELLEZAS!

Si la página te ha ayudado a ti o a alguien que conoces a quererse un poco más, si crees que es un buen recurso para quienes no están a gusto con sus cuerpos, si crees que nos merecemos seguir creciendo y extendiendo nuestra filosofía... hazte parte del proyecto y ¡COLABORA!
