story:
Howdy, Michael Skubic here. 

If you are reading this there is a chance that you know me from either Old Harbor Distilling, Hess Brewing, Point Loma, RHS, Redlands, San Diego, Rock Climbing, Surf Trips, Spain, or perhaps you just have an interest in Craft Spirits! 

If you haven't heard of Old Harbor Distilling Company, we are a small independent craft distillery located in the fringe of downtown San Diego. We produce a couple of spirits at the moment: San Miguel Southwestern Gin & Barrelflag Navy Strength Rum. We have won a few awards for them during our time open, but more importantly, we have seen bartenders and home enthusiasts take a liking to it. Our bottles are continually depleted from back bars and store shelves. We take that as a good sign.  

If you just want to stay up-to-date on the project. Donate a dollar and you'll also get a Bar & Barrel sticker in the mail ASAP!

Good news for people who love great news:

So why in Davy Jone's good name are we asking for help to pay for our bar & barrels‽  

On October 8, 2015 Governor Brown signed into law Assembly Bill 1295 which allows craft distilleries in California to start making cocktails and selling up to 2.25 liters of alcohol to-go per day. We finally are getting closer to being allowed the same benefits that wineries and breweries have been given. 

When I wrote the business model for Old Harbor Distilling Company it was 100% based off of distribution. No bar. No bottle sales. Just straight old school business models. Thankfully that has changed. Unfortunately my funding has not. We boot-strapped the start up of OHDC and we need some extra capital to get this bar going!

We are trying to bring California into the 18th Century!

Why does this matter?

If you want to have a fun place to come watch the sun set over the Central Library in East Village while taking in the scenic EVSD neighborhood in all its dirtiness and beauty. Do you want to have a chance to try spirits that would never otherwise come into existence? We need your help to accomplish the following goals.

What are we doing at the Sunset Bar?

  • We are putting in some Timothy Steven's Designed Cocktail Cockpits so we can sling the fastest, most consistent cocktails possible.
  • Kold Draft Ice Machine & A Scotsman Pebble Ice Machine
  • Two additional restrooms (no one likes waiting!)
  • 36' live edge wood bar from Made Lumber Supply.
  • The tallest back bar in the west (probably not, but it sounds cool.)
  • Roll away fence with drinking rail (sounds complicated? It is.)
Old Harbor Sunset Bar is exactly what it sounds like. A bar that opens at sundown and stays open for a few hours afterwards. We can also host private parties. Marriages. Whatever! We just want to showcase how our spirits can really make a simple cocktail stand out. 

Here is what we intend to do with the barrels:

We have lots of plans and goals at Old Harbor. Here are a few of the cool barrel related things up our sleeves.

  • Single Malt & Single Barrel Project: we are going to be fermenting and distilling every type of single malt barley we can get our hands on. We will then be aging them in both new oak & used bourbon barrels. This is to see the effect that both the wood and the character of the malt has on the final malt whiskey.
  • Mexican Heirloom Bourbon: our friends at Galaxy Taco are going to be nixtamalizing heirloom corn from Mexico for us to use as a base in our Bourbon. That's right. Black Corn, Green Corn, Red Corn. We are insatiable in our thirst for knowledge here at Old Harbor and we want to see how each of these different corns change the final product we all know so well. Eat your heart out Elmer.
  • Barrelflag Rum: We have been making Barrelflag Navy Strength Rum for 6 months now. It took us 9 months to develop, but in that time we have put some in new oak and in used oak. It is amazing how the character of the spirit is changing. In as little as 6 months! 
  • San Miguel: We have also been aging our Southwestern Gin in used Mezcal barrel. We figured if we are going to make a Southwestern-style gin, how can we make it even more Southwestern. Oaxaca is about as SXSW as you can go in North America.
  • Distilled Mead: Our friends at Golden Coast Mead have been partnering with us to develop a completely new spirit category. Distilled Honey Wine. Odin would be proud. 
  • Eau de Vie: Some eau de vie is made for drinking fresh, some is best when left to mellow in a cask for a couple of years. 
And these are just the things I am comfortable talking to you about!

Risks & Challenges

The laws have quite literally just been written. Is there a chance that we won't be able to sell you direct whiskey? Probably not, since the laws state that we can. The only qualifier is that since we are selling entire barrels, we can only sell the "barrel" meaning the American Oak housing the alcohol on IndieGoGo, but if you want to pull the booze out you will have to pay a "bottle removal from bond fee" of $5 to actually take that sweet elixir home with you. Just know in the mean time you will have 250 beautifully designed vouchers from Caava Design / Clove St. Press to cherish at night. Just keep in mind the angel's are going to take their share. So the longer it sits, the most likely that 250 is going to be come 249... then 248.. etc... Those angel's like their whisky.

Am I qualified to do this? 

This is not my first rodeo. I helped start Mike Hess Brewing Co (formerly Hess Brewing) back in 2009 when there were only 34 breweries in San Diego. I left MHBC in 2013 to form Old Harbor Distilling Co. It took me 2 years and a month from when I left Hess to open my doors to my friends & family on September 28, 2014. We had our first legal pours of San Miguel Southwestern Gin at Monkey Paw Brewery & Pub on November 19th of 2014. Exactly 1 year later we are asking for you help. I want to make an awesome bar for you and your friends to hang out at. I want to make unique liquors that we could never sell (profitably) through a distribution company. 

If I seem like I am asking for more than I deserve, that is the truth, I don't deserve this. I just hope that you can see that we at Old Harbor are 100% genuine in our goal of making the best spirits possible at the fairest price to a consumer as we can. 

If you are wondering why the Wholesale Whiskey is so much cheaper than the consumer level. Look into the Three Tier System in the United State. The Nobel Experiment and Gangsters caused that whole conundrum. More books have been written... 

p.s. Please excuse all the typos. This was all accomplished in the last five weeks. With no sleep. And I am sick. And tired. But stoked. If some of these perks sound dumb. They are. We apologize. But not really. 

If you have any questions or concerns feel free to call me at 619.630.7048 or send an email to info@oldharbordistilling.com (for PR contact Bay Bird Inc.) 

Other Ways You Can Help

Are you too young to buy booze? Don't like art? Just plain broke as me? Fear not!

Feel free to share this on your favorite social media platform. #OHbuildout #OldHarborDistilling #DrinkLocal 

Fathom Something Greater.

story:
Our Vision

We believe that every individual needs to be empowered with the tools to stream from anywhere there is an internet connection. The individual needs to be able to record activities whether they are good or bad and then be able to share those broadcasts or recordings with whomever they choose. We decided to try to fulfill that need.

My name is Shon Gale and I have been a programmer for 35 years and am semi-retired. As a result I have been able to pursue my dream and have done the programming to allow people to broadcast live or recorded info from any device. I have designed and built special media servers to handle the impact of allowing live audio and video broadcasting. Everyone gets a completely free account that will let them create their own channel to broadcast a radio station or a Television station on the internet.

itsoez.net is proud to offer free video and audio streaming complete with easy to use scheduling. AD FREE. Stream your broadcast to the world from wherever there is an internet connection. Stream your bands rehearsal, your babys birth, your baseball game, anything, anywhere, anytime. You will be able to stream to anyone or everyone you choose.


What We Need & What You Get

We currently need $750.00 per month or $10,000.00 a year to run the entire operation. That covers the costs of:

  1. Internet access
  2. Rent
  3. Electricity
  4. Server parts, hard drives, power supplies etc.
  5. Remote Broadcasting, gas, minor expenses.
What you get is a free broadcasting account for audio and video with all additions. We will also build a list of contributors and then let them know when we are broadcasting a live event that they should know about. We have already broadcast Reggae Festivals, Barter Fairs, Farmers Markets and many other live events for free while building and testing this system.

The Impact

We believe the ability to broadcast live or record to our servers from anywhere will be a substantial boost to the rights of Free Speech worldwide. We want to allow people worldwide get a voice to be heard in the world. As we were developing this we were amazed at the amount of people and places that were connected to us at different times. We haven't really launched yet and we have already been broadcasting all over the world.


Risks & Challenges

We are just finishing up the video access which will allow individuals to create a video channel online to be shown in a player on their web site and itsoez.net. We could have tried to sell this and several people do like LiveStream and UStream who want huge amounts of monthly payments to do what we want to allow people to do for free. The only risks we have are to manage our hardware and have backups and extra hard drives, power supplies and other parts needed to keep the operation going.


Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, PLEASE come to itsoez.net and listen to the wonderful alternative Radio Stations that are broadcasting now!!

We could have tried to sell this and several people do like LiveStream and UStream who want huge amounts of monthly payments to do what we want to allow people to do for free. The only risks we have are to manage our hardware and have backups and extra hard drives, power supplies and other parts needed to keep the operation going.
    
Other Ways You Can Help Even if you can't contribute, PLEASE come to itsoez.net and listen to the wonderful alternative Radio Stations that are broadcasting now!!

story:
Welcome to RHEI-MAID! Please Help Fund our Factory

Hello, my name is Mary Rhei, President of RHEI-MAID. Several years ago, my parents were ready to give up the business that they had been running for over 50 years - crafting delicious artisanal Korean condiments using family recipes handed down over generations.  I've worked for RHEI-MAID since I was 5 years old.  Fast forward 40 years... Today I'm trying to make my parents' and my dream a reality by renting a larger factory to manufacture RHEI-MAID's artisanal Korean sauces for widespread retail distribution.


RHEI-MAID, Manufacturer of Artisanal Korean Sauces 

  1. Gochujang
  2. Doenjang
  3. Ganjang


What is Gochujang?

Gochujang is a fermented red pepper paste made of rice, red chili pepper, sweetener and soybean. Gochujang is spicy and has a deep, rich flavor that is pungent and loaded with umami. It is essential to Korean cuisine and extremely versatile -- as a finishing sauce, a soup base or by itself as a condiment. Gochujang has a thick consistency due to its rice base and is deeper in flavor than most hot sauces due to its long fermentation period.

Traditional Korean Dishes That Use Gochujang:
  • Bibimbap
  • Bulgogi
  • Korean Fried Chicken
  • Doekbokki



What is Doenjang?

Doenjang is a fermented soybean paste made of crushed soybeans that are first formed into blocks, dried and fermented. The blocks are then placed in salt water to continue fermenting. When ready, the solids are separated to make doenjang.

What is Ganjang?

Ganjang is Korean soy sauce. Ganjang is the liquid that the soybean blocks (deonjang) were immersed in to be fermented. After the solids are separated to make doenjang, the remaining liquid is ganjang.


Look Who's Using RHEI-MAID



 


Chefs' Testimonies

  • Chef Jamie Bissonnette, Toro, Coppa
  • Chef Matt Jennings, Townsman
  • Chef Matthew Gaudet, West Bridge
  • Chef Bryce Shuman, Betony
  • Chef James Wayman, Oyster Club, Engine Room
  • Chef Alex Crabb, asta




A Word From a Fellow Korean... 

--Judy Joo, Chef Patron, Jinjuu Restaurant, London, Hong Kong,  Host of
"Korean Food Made Simple"-- Cooking Channel (USA,) Food Network (UK)

"RHEI-MAID products showcase old-world Korean flavors, and remind me of my grandmother's "jang." Their artisanal, hand crafted products truly reflect the depth and richness of Korean culture through serious flavor.  Traditional methods yielding unbelievable taste.  And, knowing Mary, we know these traditions will be preserved."


A Personal Note In Korean (Hangul) From Chef Choi (Mokbar, Chelsea Market, NYC)...


 

Artful Chef Creations


Why RHEI-MAID? It's About Authenticity And Tradition, Not Mass Production

RHEI-MAID sets itself apart from the competition because of tradition and authentic Korean flavors -- all three products are made with recipes and processes that date as far back as three generations. Unlike some of our competitors, RHEI-MAID's fermentation process is not expedited. It takes place over time, just like it did over 100 years ago, right in nature's kitchen.  As a result, RHEI-MAID products have that deep rich traditional old-world Korean flavor that will make any Halmoni (Grandma) proud.


Wholesome Goodness
  • Gluten-Free
  • All natural, no artificial flavors added
  • No high fructose corn syrup
  • 90% U.S. sourced ingredients
  • Soy products are vegan

Grandma didn't use high fructose corn syrup, and neither do we. We use high quality ingredients -- 90% of our ingredients are U.S sourced -- and we do NOT use additives or artificial flavors. RHEI-MAID products are gluten-free and our Doenjang and Ganjang are both gluten-free and vegan, too.  


When Good Is Bad: Tale of Product Scarcity

Our products are aged the natural, unexpedited way. All of our products are aged for no less than 6 months and our Ganjang for 3 years! This wait creates a supply issue, especially on the retail side. Having a factory should enable us to increase production by 10 times after the first year! This increase in supply should also help us to lower production costs, as ingredients will be purchased in bulk.  We will be happy pass this savings along to our customers.  Having a factory should also enable RHEI-MAID products to be more readily available, particularly in the retail market.

Factory Benefits

  • Factory should enable RHEI-MAID products to be sold to retail markets, currently unavailable due to lack of supply
  • Factory should help us buy in bulk and REDUCE EXPENSES, which will be passed to customers
  • Factory should increase production by 10 times current capacity

Hang on, It's Not Just Any Factory

We can't move into just any factory because we have complicated issues with the fermentation process:

  • Pungent odors
  • Spice factors

We need a factory off the beaten path because of these issues.  Herein lies the problem: the rent for our current factory options is double our original budgeted amount. WE NEED YOUR HELP to cover this shortfall of expenses -- $175,000.

  • $125,000 for at least a year's lease (don't forget, our products are aged for no less than 6 months and our ganjang for 3 years)
  • $50,000 for equipment and machinery

If we do not reach our goal, we will need to reduce our projected production capacity, which will significantly impact the future amount of RHEI-MAID product available in the retail markets.

With A Little Help From Our Friends...

Continuing RHEI-MAID has been one of the most humbling experiences of my life.  I am so overwhelmingly grateful to all that are helping us bring authentic, traditional Korean artisanal sauces to the retail market, by funding our factory. Starting with testimonials, rewards and finally, you!  Have you checked out the autographed aprons, cookbooks, pottery and other great perks?  Look who's autographing them:


Oppa, RHEI-MAID Style! Even better, it's autographed...

 



And if that's not enough...

Dropkick Murphys' drummer, Matt Kelly, is autographing his drumsticks too! Limited quantity -- 100 available.

Risks & Challenges

Several risks are involved with this campaign, the foremost being able to procure our factory. As with all real estate transactions, ours is not an exception -- it's first come, first served. There is a risk of the factory under consideration becoming unavailable at end of this campaign.  We are, however, continuously searching for properties, scarce as they may be.

There is also a risk of a delay in the estimated delivery date for rewards due to limited production capacity.

More Comments From Tasters of RHEI-MAID...

  • Chef Daniel Bojorquez, La Brasa
  • Chefs Jeremy Kean & Philip Kruta, Whisk
  • Chef Jay Walker, Giacomo's

  • Chef Matt Cunningham, Pink Samurai
  • Matt Kelly, Dropkick Murphys


Other Ways You Can Help

Maybe you just can't contribute money -- that's cool -- but that doesn't mean you can't help:

    • Please redistribute this campaign
    • Feel free to copy/paste from the examples below
    • Tell your family and friends about us by using the Indiegogo share tool

  • Twitter:
    • Love Korean Food? Help fund the  @RHEIMAID factory and bring Authentic, Traditional Korean Artisanal sauces to the retail market. Share and support the RHEI-MAID campaign: http://www.twitter.com/rheimaid


  • Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/rhei.maid

  • Email:
    • Help fund the RHEI-MAID factory and bring Authentic, Traditional Korean Artisanal Sauces to the retail market. Share and support the RHEI-MAID campaign by visiting:  http://igg.me/at/rheimaid

From all of us at RHEI-MAID,
Thank You Very Much! (Daedanhi Kamsahamnida!)

... Special thanks to J. Erickson & B. Heiss for their contribution to this campaign.

story:
Why Should You Support This Campaign?

Get HOPE Global's mission is to train women around the world and transform their lives. Your donation will help one of 16 women, hopefully more, to start their own small business. For only $175 a woman, or whatever you can give toward the amount, a woman in Ghana will be able to change her own life, the life of her family, and the community as a whole. With an income due to this business, she is less likely to be in poverty, have inadequate health, or live on the streets. But she needs your help.


Get HOPE Global History

Get HOPE Global began as HOPE of the Harvest in 2008 as the micro-enterprise ministry arm of Women of the Harvest. In order to offer training programs to a wider audience, Get HOPE Global (HOPE) launched as a separate non-profit entity in 2012 and expanded our service offerings in the process.  HOPE began as an (amazing!) all-volunteer team, and with the exception of three paid part-time staff members the team is still made primarily of volunteers who all have been clearly “called” to serve as champions of impoverished women and girls in need of “hope.”

How Get HOPE Global Works To Alleviate Human Trafficking

Get HOPE Global’s faith-based business training program and microloan opportunities address the above UN recommendations.  The training program works to encourage, equip, and empower impoverished women and at-risk girls with life-giving HOPE to build a better business, build a better life, and build a transforming faith in Jesus Christ.  Not only are the girls and women taught basic business skills and given the opportunity to secure a microloan to start or improve their own businesses, but they are also taught character-driven biblical lessons that support success in business and in life.  Through a comprehensive one-year program, they are empowered to develop a business plan, launch or expand a business, and plan for long-term sustainability via ethical business practices.  At the completion of the program, women are empowered to move out of the imprisonment of poverty and build a better future.


Help women like Theresa Ab. from Ghana attain a HOPE loan!

Theresa is a single mother who had almost lost all hope until the intervention of the Get-HOPE-Global training program. She is now hopeful that, with this training and the HOPE loan, she can start a business and better her life. Her shop will be convenient for the customers in her community, who now travel a far distance to purchase vegetables and other food items. Her loan will enable her to purchase food items to stock her store. Help Get-HOPE-Global provide microloans for Theresa’s group and others like it!


Or help Vera launch her business of selling biscuits.

Vera is a single mother of a young daughter, and she now has hope for a better future for them both as a result of the HOPE program. She plans to use her loan funds to purchase biscuits from a wholesaler in the city center, which she will then distribute to table-top retailers in the villages. Vera is a committed business woman and group member.  


About HOPE micro-loan groups* ::

The impoverished women and at-risk girls who are part of a HOPE microloan group have completed the required pre-qualification sessions and assignments and have been recommended for a HOPE microloan by a program leader. In addition they have each committed to the following:

  • Faithful attendance and completion of the business training course

  • Personal savings

  • Mutula respect and encouragement of others in the group

  • Responsibility of repayment of all the loans within the group - if one woman cannot make a payment, the other women will make it for her. This creates an environment of cohesion and growth as a group, not against each other.

  • Repayment rate is 99.6%

*Although this is a loan, all money paid back will go directly into the loan pool for other first-time business women in the program.


Other Ways You Can Help ::

We understand that money can be tight, so here are other ways you can support Get HOPE Global's mission to transform lives through training ::

  • PRAYER!

  • Share this campaign on social media

  • Like us on Facebook and follow us on Twitter

  • Spread awareness of this organization and the issues women are facing around the world

Other Ways You Can Help ::

story:
Please Help Us Help the Disabled! Common is the disabled veteran who discovers upon his release that such employment opportunities as exist for veterans don't fit his particular needs.

Andy Leaf, who runs DisabilityBiz.org from his home, was recognized in October by Mayor Bob Whalen of Laguna Beach, CA for helping more than 3,500 disabled persons become self-employed and self-sufficient.

Says Andy, "I know how important it is to have access to meaningful employment. I have been a wheelchair user for 50 years. I  have been involved in, and have run my own, small-businesses all my life. In 1996 I helped startup a non-profit organization that provided a variety of disability resources and small business services for people with disabilities. That organization has evolved to teach others with disabilities, especially veterans, how to start their own businesses.

In 2004 I expanded my horizons based on the needs of my community and launched the SEED Business Network, a CA 501(c)(3) non-profit organization  We help entrepreneurs with disabilities in locating resources to assist their self-employment endeavors.

 We need contributions to assist with our operating budget for 2016.

What We Need:

We need $30,000 so that our non-profit to continue operating while we roll out our new products for the disabled entrepreneur.  Funding will assist Seed Business Network by adding project management, technology and marketing resources to reach those with disabilities, i.e. veterans, who need our business tools and resources now. 

Your contribution will make certain that we can keep the organization fully functioning as it grows.  Your support is appreciated!! 

Other Ways You Can Help - Volunteer!

story:
This is not yet another “crowdfunded travel” campaign

Is it possible to crowdfund your dream travel project without looking like a selfish and lazy twenty-something who thinks that money grows on trees?

Majority of crowdfunded travel campaigns look about the same – somebody is asking for support for his/her dream travel project, promising symbolic gifts and/or souvenirs in return for a contribution. What is wrong with that kind of approach?

  • it really feels stupid to run a conventional travel crowdfunding campaign (believe us, we have already tried);
  • almost nobody actually needs the symbolic gifts and/or souvenirs that are being offered in return for a contribution;
  • travel isn’t something that should be provided for free, instead travel must be “earned” in one way or the other (you can only appreciate it fully if you have “earned” it);
  • there are countless other crowdfunding projects that deserve a contribution more than almost any travel project.

So, why is this campaign different for others?

What if, instead of asking money from you, promising something tangible in return, we just borrow money promising to transfer it to a charity or NGO of your choice? In essence we act as intermediaries between you and your chosen charity, holding the money you have provided only for a limited time.  

What difference does it make?

  • It does not feel that stupid anymore, as we are only borrowing money and not begging for it, and even more - we are not asking money only for ourselves;
  • You won’t get something you will never need, instead you will actually contribute to a cause important to you;
  • We won’t be free riders, as we will have to work our asses off in New Zealand to repay all the crowdfunded money to the corresponding charity or a NGO.

In a way this crowdfunding campaign is something like “money recycling” – we use the money provided by you to finish our dream – get to the furthest inhabited place from our home and after it has been done, we forward your money to a goal important to you. The net result is that you have achieved twice as much with any given amount of money.

Why do we need money?

We are on the road for 1 year already, trying to reach Pitt Island in New Zealand – the furthest inhabited place from our homes in Latvia. We have gotten to Thailand by trains, busses, hitchhiking, walking, one ferry, and even one cargo ship, but most enthusiastically - by cycling, hoping to avoid flying as much as possible. We started off with as much money as we could possibly save, but sooner or later any funds you have are about to run out due to some foreseeable or sometimes unforeseeable circumstances.

We will soon be facing an ocean we will have to cross, unfortunately, it will most likely be by plane (travelling by ferry of boat would at least double the expenses). We are looking to raise funds for the following travel expenses :

  • 3 tickets from Bali to New Zealand for us and our bicycles
  • 3 visas for Indonesia
  • boat and/or ferry expenses to travel Indonesian islands in order to reach Bali

This is not the first time when we have run into problems of financial character. When our bicycles got stolen in Crimea, we found jobs in Georgia and earned money for new ones. When that was not enough, we sold tea on the street and organized storytelling event with a sad looking donation box.


This time is a bit different as the possibility to find employment opportunities in Malaysia or Singapore are not very promising, considering that we won’t have legal right to work in these countries. Of course we would be able to find some means of employment (as we most probably are going to do), but unfortunately we don’t expect to earn enough to get us to New Zealand. All the money which we will somehow manage to earn in Malaysia and Singapore will have to be used for staying alive.

Who are we exactly?

We are three, maybe a bit weird Latvians, who decided one day that it is time for an adventure. We decided to try our luck in reaching the furthest inhabited place from our home in Riga, Latvia. This place happens to be in Pitt Island, New Zealand approximately 18 000 km from Latvia.

(Dainis - the idea generating, often singing, lawyer and bookworm – the dreamer)

(Laura - the in-between studies artsy wannabe and cocktail shaker – the optimist)

(Ivars – the always geocaching, suspiciously silent IT guru and resident beardmaster – the pragmatist)


Motivation

Almost everyone has at least considered traveling around the globe at some point in their lives. It’s almost inevitably a dream that never actually comes true - sometimes it’s fear of the unknown, other times life just takes an unexpected turn and that dream is no longer easily achievable. Our purpose is to show ourselves and others that making your dreams come true isn’t just for “the chosen ones”. You require “only” fortitude, self-belief and determination with a pinch of stubbornness to pursue your dream.

Other Ways You Can Help

Do not have the funds or the patience to fund another “twenty-something”?

  • It is not only money that can be helpful to our project, our idea, exposure can sometimes mean as much, so please spread the word!

  • If you do not wish to help us, help others! We are, after all, just people.

Side note

If you consider our idea and effort as something that deserves your attention and maybe even help, but can’t think of any charity/NGO which you would like to support, we encourage you to support the United Nations Refugee Agency. As you already know, currently the world is experiencing the largest migration crisis since the WWII, by the end of year 2014 59.4 million people were forcibly displaced as a result of persecution, conflict, generalized violence, or human rights violations. The number of displaced persons has increased dramatically since the escalation of civil war in Syria and other countries.

UNHCR has helped tens of millions of refugees and asylum seekers and in our opinion is the organization most capable of helping these people. It is almost entirely funded by direct, voluntary contributions and at this moment any additional support is essential. 

This is it!

P.S. If you are not convinced that we deserve a your help to accomplish what we have started, at least consider finding a way to contribute something to a cause important to you!

P.P.S Follow this link to donate directly to - HERE
story_txt:
This is not yet another “crowdfunded
travel” campaign
Is it possible to
crowdfund your dream travel project without looking like a selfish and lazy
twenty-something who thinks that money grows on trees?
Majority of crowdfunded travel campaigns look
about the same – somebody is asking for support for his/her dream travel
project, promising symbolic gifts and/or souvenirs in return for a contribution.
What is wrong with that kind of approach? 


it
really feels stupid to run a conventional travel crowdfunding campaign (believe
us, we have already tried);


almost
nobody actually needs the symbolic gifts and/or souvenirs that are being offered
in return for a contribution;


travel
isn’t something that should be provided for free, instead travel must be “earned”
in one way or the other (you can only appreciate it fully if you have “earned” it);


there
are countless other crowdfunding projects that deserve a contribution more than
almost any travel project.


So, why is this campaign
different for others? 
What if, instead of asking money from you, promising
something tangible in return, we just borrow money promising to transfer it to
a charity or NGO of your choice? In essence we act as intermediaries between
you and your chosen charity, holding the money you have provided only for a
limited time.  What difference does
it make?

It does not feel that stupid anymore, as we are
     only borrowing money and not begging for it, and even more - we are not
     asking money only for ourselves;
You won’t get something you will never need,
     instead you will actually contribute to a cause important to you;
We won’t be free riders, as we will have to work
     our asses off in New Zealand to repay all the crowdfunded money to the
     corresponding charity or a NGO.
In a way this crowdfunding campaign is something
like “money recycling” – we use the
money provided by you to finish our dream – get to the furthest inhabited place
from our home and after it has been done, we forward your money to a goal
important to you. The net result is that you have achieved twice as much with
any given amount of money. 
Why do we need money?
We are on the road for 1 year already, trying
to reach Pitt Island in New Zealand – the furthest inhabited place from our
homes in Latvia. We have gotten to Thailand by trains, busses, hitchhiking,
walking, one ferry, and even one cargo ship, but most enthusiastically - by
cycling, hoping to avoid flying as much as possible. We started off with as
much money as we could possibly save, but sooner or later any funds you have are about to run out due to some foreseeable or sometimes unforeseeable circumstances.

We will soon be facing an ocean we will have to
cross, unfortunately, it will most likely be by plane (travelling by ferry of
boat would at least double the expenses). We are looking to raise funds for the
following travel expenses :
3 tickets from Bali to New Zealand for us and
     our bicycles
3 visas for Indonesia
boat and/or ferry expenses to travel Indonesian
     islands in order to reach Bali
This is not the first time when we have run
into problems of financial character. When our bicycles got stolen in Crimea, we
found jobs in Georgia and earned money for new ones. When that was not
enough, we sold tea on the street
and organized storytelling event with a
sad looking donation box. 
This time is a bit different as the possibility to find employment opportunities
in Malaysia or Singapore are not very promising, considering that we won’t have legal right to work in these
countries. Of course we would be able to find some means of employment (as we most probably are going to do),
but unfortunately we don’t expect to earn enough to get us to New Zealand. All
the money which we will somehow manage to earn in Malaysia and Singapore will
have to be used for staying alive. 
Who are we exactly? 

We are three, maybe a bit weird
Latvians, who decided one day that it is time for an adventure. We decided to
try our luck in reaching the furthest inhabited place from our home in Riga,
Latvia. This place happens to be in Pitt Island, New Zealand approximately
18 000 km from Latvia.(Dainis
- the idea generating, often singing, lawyer and bookworm – the dreamer)(Laura - the in-between studies artsy wannabe and cocktail shaker – the optimist)(Ivars
– the always geocaching, suspiciously silent IT guru and resident beardmaster –
the pragmatist)

Motivation
Almost everyone has at least considered traveling
around the globe at some point in their lives. It’s almost inevitably a dream
that never actually comes true - sometimes it’s fear of the unknown, other
times life just takes an unexpected turn and that dream is no longer easily
achievable. Our purpose is to show ourselves and others that making your dreams
come true isn’t just for “the chosen ones”. You require “only” fortitude,
self-belief and determination with a pinch of stubbornness to pursue your
dream.

Other Ways You Can Help
Do not have the funds or the patience to fund another “twenty-something”?

It is not only money that can be helpful to our project, our idea, exposure can sometimes mean as much, so please spread the word!
If you do not wish to help us, help others! We are, after all, just people.

Side note
If you consider our idea and effort as something
that deserves your attention and maybe even help, but can’t think of any
charity/NGO which you would like to support, we encourage you to support the United
Nations Refugee Agency. As you already know, currently the world is
experiencing the largest migration crisis since the WWII, by the end of year
2014 59.4 million people were forcibly displaced as a result of persecution,
conflict, generalized violence, or human rights violations. The number of displaced
persons has increased dramatically since the escalation of civil war in Syria
and other countries. 
UNHCR has helped tens of millions of refugees
and asylum seekers and in our opinion is the organization most capable of
helping these people. It is almost entirely funded by direct, voluntary
contributions and at this moment any additional support is essential. 
This is it!
P.S. If you are not convinced that we deserve a your help to accomplish what we have started, at least consider finding a way to contribute something to a cause important to you!P.P.S Follow this link to donate directly to - HERE

story:
"The Art of Empowerment"

South Africa is one of the most economically unequal countries in the world. It's time we brought opportunity to the creative skill that is bursting from South Africa's seams. 

  • Empowerment through Skills Training
  • Business & marketing support for those wanting to start their own businesses
  • Providing a stable and generous income for our Creators- whether through partner organizations, our own workshop, or those who have launched their own creative businesses. 

After 2 years of laying the groundwork - we are ready to take the next step and take Sparrow Society to the NEXT LEVEL!  Help us reach more communities and more artisans by donating towards this campaign!

The Impact

Our products don't just give a portion to charity - the products themselves are the avenue of empowerment enabling our Creators to work towards their own development instead of relying on charity and government assistance.  

It's the difference between just paying for a woman's child to go to school, and actually empowering her with the opportunity to provide for her own family and support her child's education! It doesn't just stop the downward spiral of the poverty trap- but actually starts the journey to reverse it!

  • We create fun, dignifying and well paying jobs that allow artisans to reach their full creative and business potential.
  • You can help us launch a Creative Hub to take these efforts even further and reach even more people and communities!

What We Need & What You Get

We have outgrown our humble beginnings in a garage and shipping container and are bursting at the seams!  We have grown to capacity where we are now, but we don't want to close our doors to new Creators.  In order for us to step into this next season with strength, we need YOUR HELP:
  • We are asking for $4,321 to help us launch our new operations with excellence and provide our Creators with a creative and dignifying workshop as well as increase our ability to offer support to those wanting to learn new creative skills and helping those ready to start their own businesses.  The money will go towards individual workstations, industrial sewing machines, a cutting table, and setting up the new workspace with shelving and a fresh coat of paint!  We also need a security gate and new lighting.  Best part- this seed will help us to create EVEN MORE JOBS! YOU can be a part of that!
  • As a thank you for partnering with us, we've got some of our "… Really Cool Products…" to send out to you - wherever in the world you might be!  At our top giving level, we are even offering a sneak peek pack of our NEW designs that haven't even been officially launched yet!  Plus - these perks make the PERFECT CHRISTMAS PRESENTS!!! Give gifts that give back :)
  • Every little bit helps us - so even if we don't reach our target amount, we can focus on the top priorities first (like the security gate and sewing machines) and then add the other perks to the workshop later.  But let's dream a little bit… Anything above the $4,321 will go straight into our Creator Development Fund enabling up-skilling and further study and training (like University scholarships/bursaries!). 

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't give but still want to support?? 
You can help us by sharing this campaign and interacting with us on social media! Please please please!

Thanks again for all your support!!! We are looking forward to stepping into this new season with you!

story:
This is our indiegogo we set up for our super hard core fans that still wanted to help even though our kickstarter didn't make it. We thank those that believe in us so much.

Setting Sun Sake Brewing Co. - Sake Revolution

Setting Sun Sake Brewing Co. is a Southern California craft sake brewery currently under-construction. Inspired by music, art, and food, we are taking on the next frontier in the craft-brewing world. Using locally sourced ingredients and a house blend of yeast, we brew with flavors and techniques than have not yet been introduced in the sake world. It has taken us nearly two years of grinding our gears to take us from the initial idea to now, where we are nearly ready to stop pulling our hair out and open! Wooohooo!!!

In December of 2013, we had our first talk about opening a sake brewery and it took us just over a year to sweet talk the startup funds out of a very, very handsome and funny investor. Six months later, we scored a perfect location in Miramar, right in the heart of a bustling part of the San Diego craft brew scene. And with two devilishly good looking, driven, versatile, and experienced dudes in the craft brewing industry on the team, the brewery is well on it's way to opening.

Even though craft sake is new and unique as it is, we want Setting Sun Sake Brewing Co. brewery to be more than a craft brewery by numbers. We want the brewery to be legendary, to be a standing expression of the sake revolution, and to fully encompass the SoCal spirit.

This is why we need your deep pockets, sugar daddy and/or mommy. We are offering some stylish compensation for your hard earned generosity.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

We didn't have a successful run on kickstarter but we still want to get the swag to the people and still want to pimp out our tasting room. We will have to plan on getting the rice polisher later but we definitely would love to get you some sweet swag in exchange for building materials for our tasting room. 


Risks and challenges

With some our rewards requiring a high level of craftsmanship, although unlikely, it is possible that some of the rewards could be delayed in shipment.

Several of our thank you prizes depend on clothing and glass supplier that could have their own internal issues. Although there is always more than one option as far as suppliers go, shipment could be delayed as a result.

We have given ourselves a fair amount of time to come through with the treasures, but as starting up is our primary objective, if our time is consumed, it may take us a bit longer than estimated to deliver. We will do absolutely everything in our power to avoid this situation and come through on time.


Other Ways You Can Help

For those that cant chip in the dough but still want to show some love please share the link to our indiegogo.

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Summary

This campaign is raising funds to re-open the Ariel General Store and Tavern located in Ariel, Washington State, USA. For the last 25 years, it was home to the world-famous 'DB Cooper Days' festival, and contains the largest collection of articles and memorabilia ever assembled about the famous hijacking.  In fact, the U.S. Army's search for the hijacker in early 1972 was based out back of the store.

In late 2015, owner Dona Elliot passed away, and her son Bryan Woodruff took the reins.  Mrs. Elliot's business licenses passed away with her, and the store has been closed ever since, because some repairs are now required by the state and county in order for Mr. Woodruff to continue his mother's legacy.

The Ariel Store building has been in existence since 1929. It is also the main gathering place for local residents living in the Amboy, Ariel, and other unincorporated areas of Cowlitz County. It has taken on a historical significance in the community, and during the annual DB Cooper Days festival that happens on the Saturday following Thanksgiving, visitors come from other states, even other countries to attend. During winter months, local residents who can't make it into the town of Woodland to do their shopping buy basic groceries at the store.

Who We Are and What We Need

The campaign is coordinated by the staff of Adventure Books of Seattle, and chaired by managing editor Robert Blevins.  The author of several science fiction books, Blevins also investigated the Cooper case and co-wrote the controversial book 'Into The Blast,' about DB Cooper suspect Kenny Christiansen. He also filmed a 90-minute video on the Cooper Days Festival for YouTube in 2012, and has appeared on History Channel's Brad Meltzer's Decoded. He is a personal friend of Mr. Woodruff.

Funds raised will be used to level the floor of the building a bit, replace kitchen equipment, roof repairs, and to make any additional corrections required by both the Cowlitz County Health Department, and building code inspectors. The store and tavern are expected to reopen by November, 2016.

What YOU Get

We offer several collectible perks for contributors, and if you live in the Northwest, or are a DB Cooper fan, come on down to the party in November. 

If you have any questions about this project, contact Robert Blevins at adventurebooksofseattle AT Gmail Dot Com.

Volunteer List: (Current as of May 1, 2016)
Robert Blevins
Gayla J. Prociv (CEO Adventure Books of Seattle)
Tina Strong (Advisor)
Phoebe Ezell (Advisor)

*If you live in the general Cowlitz County, WA area, or just want to help out, contact Robert for details.

story:
What Is Buy The Block Intending To Correct? 

"According to a report, African-Americans have lost over half of their wealth since the beginning of the recession through falling home ownership rates and loss of jobs," it reads.

Pew Research Center data from 2011 that shows the median net worth of black households decreased by 53 percent from $12,124 in 2005 to $5,677 in 2009. Technically, this loss fits the timeline of the housing crisis in 2006.

More closely follows the financial crisis of 2007. According to that report, median net worth of the black household decreased from $19,200 in 2007 to $11,000 in 2013 (in 2013 dollars). That’s a loss of 43 percent.

 

LETS GET TO 100% IN LESS THAN  11 DAYS! 

Buy The Block is ALL or NOTHING! 

If we do not reach 100% of our goal, you will receive 100% of your contribution. 

Home ownership rates are down, way down. That much is no secret. People are renting later into their lives, often with no plans to ever own their own piece of property. It’s a sad state of affairs, one that has been building and developing for a long time now, one that we can no longer ignore, one that we need to face head on if we are ever going to do anything about it. We at BuyTheBlock.com recognize this situation for what it is, and we are intent on doing something to change it.

With our website and  mobile app, we are making it simple and easy for people in our community to invest in properties and become owners. This effort  will allow us re-develop dilapidated areas and increase real estate ownership. That’s a win-win, as prospective property owners can do more with their money while doing good for people in need at the same time. This sort of model is the future of business all around the world, and we are proud to be at the forefront.

Right now, we have come to you, (Indiegogo), for help raising $60,000. This start-up capital will cover the costs of developing and deploying our website and mobile app, bringing the BuyThe Block.com operation the next level. We appreciate all contributions. Thank you for your time.

 

Founder Lynn

What Will Buy The Block Do To Help Create Wealth In Our Community? 

Our vision is to change investing from  confusing and frustrating, to an accessible and enjoyable social experience. We want to create a new generation of connected investors who feel informed empowered, and confident.​ Your contribution will help us complete our website and develop our app. In addition, help you buy a piece of your first block.

Buy The Block makes investing easy

We believe the current investing options aren’t meeting the expectations of the next generation. We are developing an accessible, collaborative, friendly and fun investing environment for both new and experienced investors. BuyTheBlock.com provides a seamless and secure solution that empowers people to invest together in a way that’s never been.

Shared intelligence, shared returns

Make more informed investment decisions by tapping the collective expertise of your network. BuyTheBlock.com allows you to propose, discuss, and vote on trades with your peers anywhere, anytime.

 

Removing the Barriers

For most, the idea of investing in real-estate is onerous, intimidating, and confusing – we want to make it simple and accessible for everyone. With Buy The Block, you and your peers can combine your resources to share profit invest with the authority of a large portfolio.

Making Investing Friendly

We want to transform investing from a frustrating chore to a comfortable and enjoyable social experience. We value simplicity and intuitive design— two things we believe are missing from personal investing.

Forming Communities

We want to create a new generation of connected investors who feel informed, empowered, and confident. With Buy The Block you can conduct research and improve your investment acumen by following highly successful individuals and funds.

Form an investment group and invite partners

 

Invest in a group with your trusted peers.

 

Combine your funds and expertise

Combine resources and split commissions. Validate the next hot property before you invest. Leverage collective intelligence to generate superior returns.

 

Propose, discuss and vote on trades

Collaborative decision making — intuitive proposal, discussion, and voting give you the confidence and knowledge to trade.

 

Collaboratively manage your portfolio

Learn from, compete with, and follow your peers and the best investors in the Buy The Block community.

Follow and learn from other groups

Get real-time insights on what top groups are investing reducing your time to research what’s hot.

 

Research properties and receive relevant news

Research forms the backbone of every new brilliant investment idea or strategy. In a world where more information is available than ever before, Buy The Block ensures you have the tools to research with speed and efficiency.

 

Our Progress on Buy the Block

BuyTheBlock.com has been in development for almost a year. Prototype versions of the website and app have been made; we have a $250,000 real estate portfolio; we've got partnerships lined up. We’re ready to become the property investing platform for everyone, but we have a few small tasks left to complete before our vision is realized:

· We need to build out the back-end software.
· We’d like to refine the production versions of our website and app.
· We need to beta-test the website and  app at scale.
· We need to finalize and solidify a few legal items.

When we accomplish the final steps above, we’ll be ready to launch! With the support of excited backers like you, we predict a successful January 2017 roll out of BuyTheBlock.com and from there, the sky’s the limit! Help us reach our goal and back us on IndieGoGo today.

This is only the beginning. Let's plant the seed to create wealth.

 

The founder of Buy The Block has been active in her community for a very long time. Photo: Cleaning up Avondale.

We want to create a new generation of connected investors who feel informed empowered, and confident.​ Your contribution will help us complete our website and develop our app. In addition, help you buy a piece of your first block.Buy The Block makes investing easyWe believe the current investing options aren’t meeting the expectations of the next generation. We are developing an accessible, collaborative, friendly and fun investing environment for both new and experienced investors. BuyTheBlock.com provides a seamless and secure solution that empowers people to invest together in a way that’s never been.Shared intelligence, shared returnsMake more informed investment decisions by tapping the collective expertise of your network. BuyTheBlock.com allows you to propose, discuss, and vote on trades with your peers anywhere, anytime. Removing the BarriersFor most, the idea of investing in real-estate is onerous, intimidating, and confusing – we want to make it simple and accessible for everyone. With Buy The Block, you and your peers can combine your resources to share profit invest with the authority of a large portfolio.Making Investing FriendlyWe want to transform investing from a frustrating chore to a comfortable and enjoyable social experience. We value simplicity and intuitive design— two things we believe are missing from personal investing.Forming CommunitiesWe want to create a new generation of connected investors who feel informed, empowered, and confident. With Buy The Block you can conduct research and improve your investment acumen by following highly successful individuals and funds.Form an investment group and invite partners 
Invest in a group with your trusted peers.
 

Combine your funds and expertise
Combine resources and split commissions. Validate the next hot property before you invest. Leverage collective intelligence to generate superior returns.

 


Propose, discuss and vote on trades
Collaborative decision making — intuitive proposal, discussion, and voting give you the confidence and knowledge to trade.

 

Collaboratively manage your portfolio
Learn from, compete with, and follow your peers and the best investors in the Buy The Block community.


Follow and learn from other groups

Get real-time insights on what top groups are investing reducing your time to research what’s hot.
 

Research properties and receive relevant news
Research forms the backbone of every new brilliant investment idea or strategy. In a world where more information is available than ever before, Buy The Block ensures you have the tools to research with speed and efficiency.
 
Our Progress on Buy the Block
BuyTheBlock.com has been in development for almost a year. Prototype versions of the website and app have been made; we have a $250,000 real estate portfolio; we've got partnerships lined up. We’re ready to become the property investing platform for everyone, but we have a few small tasks left to complete before our vision is realized:
· We need to build out the back-end software.· We’d like to refine the production versions of our website and app.· We need to beta-test the website and  app at scale.· We need to finalize and solidify a few legal items.
When we accomplish the final steps above, we’ll be ready to launch! With the support of excited backers like you, we predict a successful January 2017 roll out of BuyTheBlock.com and from there, the sky’s the limit! Help us reach our goal and back us on IndieGoGo today.
This is only the beginning. Let's plant the seed to create wealth.
 
The founder of Buy The Block has been active in her community for a very long time. Photo: Cleaning up Avondale.

story:
What is the Business Hound social platform?

We want to build an online community to unite Micro Businesses, giving them a place to share knowledge, connect, get access to support and information on improving their business.  

      

      

 

 

Why we need your help

We all know someone with a Micro Business, whether it's a family member or friend. They represent some of the hardest working people, that often face difficult, unsupported decisions and issues on a daily-basis.  Our economy is dependant on their contribution and it's time we supported them by trying to make their lives a little easier. 

 

What's in it for members?

Members will get free access to the community and use of our two self-funded apps:

Business Hound - A financial admin tool for tracking mileage, capturing receipts, sending invoices and collating your books for the end-of-year.
Available now! www.mybusinesshound.com


SalesCraft - A personal sales coach that helps you manage sales, track enquires, get advice from others and read guides on sales best practice. Currently in beta with live launch within 2 weeks of campaign completion!

 

            

 

Use of funds  

Our apps have been built in our spare time with blood, sweat and tears. We plan to use the money raised to build and launch the Business Hound Social Platform to help Micro Businesses everywhere.    

             

 

Making a contribution  

By pledging, you are not only helping your business but you're giving to the Micro Business community. You might not own a business, but you can subscribe on behalf of someone else and gift it to them. 

        

 

The Team

We're a group of app developers and small business owners, with a passion for helping other small businesses achieve success. Our mission is to build a social platform to give all small businesses a collective voice and representation. 

The Business Hound mantra is centred on being honest, simple, fair and loyal and we need your help to bring our next part of the journey to life. We've already self-funded two apps and we now need funding to build this community and home for all small businesses across the country.

 

             

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Do you know someone who's always busting their buns and owns a small business? Please share our campaign far and wide!

story:
Peace Family,

I Am The Message, And I Am Writing This As A Unified Call To Action For Our Communities. As We All Know The Energy Of The Planet Is Shifting And More And More Information Is Being Brought To The Forefront However, There Is Still A Gap When It Comes To Our Community Seeing Wrong In The World And Reposting On Social Media And Acting On It.

UniverSoul Studios Was Created To Bridge That Gap By Providing Step By Step Instructions On How To Be Producers Instead Of Consumers, How To Cut Costs, How To Invest In Yourself, And How To Separate From The System Collectively.

Currently We Are Operating Our Online Podcasts In The Southeast And In The DMV Area of The United States. Our Goal Is To Expand UniverSoul Studios Internationally Across Different Mediums And To Educate And Empower Our Community Through Books, Radio, Plays, Live Performances, Theatre, Spoken Word, Music, And Other Forms Of Art.

Our Next Step Is Expanding South By Opening A Third And Fourth Studio In Central And South America. The Purpose Of This Move Is To Bridge The Gap Between Communities That Have No Interaction With One Another Aside From What Is Shown On Mass Media. It Is Finally Time To Reinvent The Wheel. #TeamRebuild

If This Message Resonates With You We Ask That You Either Donate What You Can And/Or Share The Indiegogo Link With Anyone You Feel Would Be Interested In This Spiritual Movement. We Are Trying To Raise $50,000 By October 5th And All Proceeds Are Going Toward Building A Third And Fourth Studio In Central America (Panama) And South America (Ecuador) And Our "Rebuilding Our Communities, One Seed At A Time" Initiative Where We Plant Fruit And Vegetable Seeds/Plants/Trees In Each Of Our Neighborhoods. This Is So That Every Home In Our Communities Can Have Assets (Free Supermarkets) In Their Backyard In 3 Weeks - 4 Years Depending On Weather And Climate. See Video Below For Reference:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O6oJA_xhTa8


If You Have Made It This Far It Is Time To Rebuild! If We All Assembled And Begged Through The Black Lives Matter Movement, It Is Now Time To RENAME That Movement To The REBUILD MOVEMENT. No More Begging! Now We Rebuild!

www.universoulstudios.com
www.facebook.com/universoulstudios
