story_txt: HELLO, WE'RE BACON BOXES.Dear Friends & Supporters,We humbly stand before you to request your continued support. Join us for the expansion of Bacon Boxes. We are in a bit of a predicament. There is no hiding the fact that we have outgrown our kitchen. Many of you know that we are limited in space and if you do not submit your order early chances are we can’t provide. It breaks our heart just as much as it does yours. It’s time that we invest in the future of bacon. With your help we can eliminate our limitations, offer more products, offer quicker shipping times and impact our community economically and agriculturally.OUR GOAL:Bacon Boxes is in need of a larger and more equipped space. So far we have worked really hard to raise funding from sales and our goal is to raise a minimum of $100,000 from sales and crowdfunding. We’re stuck intermittently with a cramped workflow while running at capacity and a limitation to raise higher capital based on those two factors alone. Our crowd funder is not all for fun and games. We mean business. It took a lot for us to conclude that this method of fund raising would be best for us. The co-founders, Kim and Logan, applied to receive a loan however with only being incorporated for a year it was found that Bacon Boxes does not qualify for private bank loans or SBA funding until completing two years of business. Instead of asking for handouts we have created incentive packages and teamed up with an artist to bring you the latest styles of bacon apparel in the hopes to meet and exceed our funding goals. Any proceeds raised over the cost of our buildout will be donated to a charity that supports responsible farming and advocates for small family owned farms. WHAT WE NEED:1. Space (est. $2,500-2,800/M)We currently work out of a 500 sq ft space and are able to cater to 200 orders a week. We aren't able to fit any more refrigeration which means we can't cure for additional orders or even think about offering new products. Having a space will open many doors. We're aiming to expand into a 1,700-2500 sq ft space. 2. Kitchen Equipment (est. $32,000)With the buildout of our own space we will be needing to purchase refrigerators, freezers, ovens, smokers, sinks, workstations and more! If you have any used equipment you're looking to get rid of please contact us. To keep the cost and environmental impact low we will be purchasing used, repurposed and refurbished. 3. Installation (est. $15,000-18,000)This budget is for small renovations, painting, plumbing, electrical, misc. upgrades and installation of the hood vent and grease traps.4. Misc. (est. $30,000)This budget is for hiring more team members, new product development, covering unforeseen complications, planning our grand opening celebration, organization, and marketing.   WHAT IS BACON BOXES?Bacon Roses. The claim to our wonderful fame. A for-fun turned for-profit. We are the first company under Department of Agricultural licensing to produce minimal processed bacon roses and ship them nationwide. We are also the first company to offer an alternative to pork...,  duck bacon roses. Bacon Boxes will soon expand into other tasty treats. Young Entrepreneurs. Bacon Boxes is an all women powered team of 20-something year old innovators and makers. Our team is diverse we're a group of fun loving college students and graduates with green science, agriculture, tech and business related backgrounds.B-Corporation Standards. The world needs companies like us. We care about quality. We care about the environment. We care about making unforgettable memories. We care about your satisfaction. JOIN US:Create memories with us! Business aside, Bacon Boxes are fun. Whether you’re celebrating a special occasion or treating yourself our bacon is sure to give you a case of the feel goods. The gratification is real. We make great memories that will last you a lifetime.Create standards with us! As much as we love the fun we also love our community and planet. We source exclusively from American family owned farms that are responsible and environmentally sustainable. Our farmers use methods that are humane, reduce pollution, and reduce waste. Bacon is bacon, but what if I told you there are no additives such as hormones, steroids or antibiotics in our products. We advocate for change and to standardize quality.Create jobs with us! We’re a great place to be employed. We offer team building skills, life building and interest centered tasks that make for a happier and healthier work environment. We look for individuals who put their heart and mind into what they do and in return we invest our heart and mind into their futures. With the expansion of the kitchen we will be able to accept more orders which means we will need more hands to help. This means employing more Americans and offering the opportunity to our youth for educational programs to be facilitated in our headquarters for culinary, business and communications.Continue the fun with us! Bacon Roses are awesome. They’re sweet, a bit whimsical and oh so tasty. We’ve received many requests for other bacon related items especially during events from the breweries and bar folk. The rest of our market has been begging to come visit our kitchen and freely sample our deliciousness. Solutions.. Solutions. At the current moment we do not have the storage or work space to begin a secondary product line however we have experimented and on special occasions offered other bacon treats. With our new space there will be an intimate lounge area for special visits and a back area big enough to add the requirements to bring you the mouthwatering bacon you crave.OUR CROWD FUNDER OFFERING:Bacon [is cheaper than] TherapyBaconologist or Ok, But first BaconBacon RoséSHIRT STYLES DESIGNSWHAT THE FUTURE LOOKS LIKEBelow is the concept and stylistic set up for the future of our open to the public Bacon Boxes location. We hope to root ourselves in a redevelopment part of town as an effort to build community. To keep the cost and environmental impact low we will be purchasing used, repurposed and refurbished. Please note these are not actual photos however are simulations of the direction.   Contact UsSara Bryan, Assistant/Customer ServiceEmail: info@baconboxes.comWebsite: baconboxes.comFacebook: fb.com/baconboxesInstagram: @baconboxesTwitter: @baconboxes Once you have ordered please go to www.baconboxes.com/order to choose your design.
